7511 col = c_red;
7512 } else {
7513 col = iter->example->color_in_inventory();
7514 }
7515 }
7516 trim_and_print( w_items, point( 1, iNum - iStartPos ), width - 9, col, sText );
7517 const int numw = iItemNum > 9 ? 2 : 1;
7518 const int x = iter->vIG[iThisPage].pos.x;
7519 const int y = iter->vIG[iThisPage].pos.y;
7520 mvwprintz( w_items, point( width - 6 - numw, iNum - iStartPos ),
7521 iNum == iActive ? c_light_green : c_light_gray,
7522 "%*d %s", numw, rl_dist( point_zero, point( x, y ) ),
7523 direction_name_short( direction_from( point_zero, point( x, y ) ) ) );
7524 ++iter;
7525 }
7526 } else {
7527 ++iter;
7528 }
7529 iNum++;
7530 }
7531 iNum = 0;
7532 for( int i = 0; i < iActive; i++ ) {
7533 if( !mSortCategory[i].empty() ) {
7534 iNum++;
7535 }
7536 }
7537 mvwprintz( w_items_border, point( ( width - 9 ) / 2 + ( iItemNum > 9 ? 0 : 1 ), 0 ),
7538 c_light_green, " %*d", iItemNum > 9 ? 2 : 1, iItemNum > 0 ? iActive - iNum + 1 : 0 );
7539 wprintz( w_items_border, c_white, " / %*d ", iItemNum > 9 ? 2 : 1, iItemNum - iCatSortNum );
7540 werase( w_item_info );
7541
7542 if( iItemNum > 0 && activeItem ) {
7543 std::vector<iteminfo> vThisItem;
7544 std::vector<iteminfo> vDummy;
7545 activeItem->example->info( true, vThisItem );
7546
7547 item_info_data dummy( "", "", vThisItem, vDummy, iScrollPos );
7548 dummy.without_getch = true;
7549 dummy.without_border = true;
7550
7551 draw_item_info( w_item_info, dummy );
7552 }
7553 draw_scrollbar( w_items_border, iActive, iMaxRows, iItemNum, point_south );
7554 wnoutrefresh( w_items_border );
7555 }
7556
7557 const bool bDrawLeft = ground_items.empty() || filtered_items.empty() || !activeItem || filter_type;
7558 draw_custom_border( w_item_info, bDrawLeft, true, true, true, LINE_XXXO, LINE_XOXX, true, true );
7559
7560 if( iItemNum > 0 && activeItem ) {
7561 // print info window title: < item name >
7562 mvwprintw( w_item_info, point( 2, 0 ), "< " );
7563 trim_and_print( w_item_info, point( 4, 0 ), width - 8, activeItem->example->color_in_inventory(),
7564 activeItem->example->display_name() );
7565 wprintw( w_item_info, " >" );
7566 }
7567
7568 wnoutrefresh( w_items );
7569 wnoutrefresh( w_item_info );
7570
7571 if( filter_type ) {
7572 draw_item_filter_rules( w_item_info, 0, iInfoHeight - 1, filter_type.value() );
7573 }
7574 } );
7575
7576 cata::optional<tripoint> trail_start;
7577 cata::optional<tripoint> trail_end;
7578 bool trail_end_x = false;
7579 shared_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> trail_cb = create_trail_callback( trail_start, trail_end,
7580 trail_end_x );
7581 add_draw_callback( trail_cb );
7582
7583 do {
7584 if( action == "COMPARE" && activeItem ) {
7585 game_menus::inv::compare( u, active_pos );
7586 } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
7587 filter_type = item_filter_type::FILTER;
7588 ui.invalidate_ui();
7589 string_input_popup()
7590 .title( _( "Filter:" ) )
7591 .width( 55 )
7592 .description( _( "UP: history, CTRL-U: clear line, ESC: abort, ENTER: save" ) )
7593 .identifier( "item_filter" )
7594 .max_length( 256 )
7595 .edit( sFilter );
7596 refilter = true;
7597 addcategory = !sort_radius;
7598 uistate.list_item_filter_active = !sFilter.empty();
7599 filter_type = cata::nullopt;
7600 } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
7601 sFilter.clear();
7602 filtered_items = ground_items;
7603 refilter = true;
7604 uistate.list_item_filter_active = false;
7605 addcategory = !sort_radius;
7606 } else if( action == "EXAMINE" && !filtered_items.empty() && activeItem ) {
7607 std::vector<iteminfo> vThisItem;
7608 std::vector<iteminfo> vDummy;
7609 activeItem->example->info( true, vThisItem );
7610
7611 item_info_data info_data( activeItem->example->tname(), activeItem->example->type_name(), vThisItem,
7612 vDummy );
7613 info_data.handle_scrolling = true;
7614
7615 draw_item_info( [&]() -> catacurses::window {
7616 return catacurses::newwin( TERMY, width - 5, point_zero );
7617 }, info_data );
7618 } else if( action == "PRIORITY_INCREASE" ) {
7619 filter_type = item_filter_type::HIGH_PRIORITY;
7620 ui.invalidate_ui();
7621 list_item_upvote = string_input_popup()
7622 .title( _( "High Priority:" ) )
7623 .width( 55 )
7624 .text( list_item_upvote )
7625 .description( _( "UP: history, CTRL-U clear line, ESC: abort, ENTER: save" ) )
7626 .identifier( "list_item_priority" )
7627 .max_length( 256 )
7628 .query_string();
7629 refilter = true;
7630 addcategory = !sort_radius;
7631 uistate.list_item_priority_active = !list_item_upvote.empty();
7632 filter_type = cata::nullopt;
7633 } else if( action == "PRIORITY_DECREASE" ) {
7634 filter_type = item_filter_type::LOW_PRIORITY;
7635 ui.invalidate_ui();
7636 list_item_downvote = string_input_popup()
7637 .title( _( "Low Priority:" ) )
7638 .width( 55 )
7639 .text( list_item_downvote )
7640 .description( _( "UP: history, CTRL-U clear line, ESC: abort, ENTER: save" ) )
7641 .identifier( "list_item_downvote" )
7642 .max_length( 256 )
7643 .query_string();
7644 refilter = true;
7645 addcategory = !sort_radius;
7646 uistate.list_item_downvote_active = !list_item_downvote.empty();
7647 filter_type = cata::nullopt;
7648 } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
7649 if( sort_radius ) {
7650 sort_radius = false;
7651 addcategory = true;
7652 uistate.list_item_sort = 2; // list is sorted by category
7653 } else {
7654 sort_radius = true;
7655 uistate.list_item_sort = 1; // list is sorted by distance
7656 }
7657 highPEnd = -1;
7658 lowPStart = -1;
7659 iCatSortNum = 0;
7660
7661 mSortCategory.clear();
7662 refilter = true;
7663 } else if( action == "TRAVEL_TO" && activeItem ) {
7664 if( !u.sees( u.pos() + active_pos ) ) {
7665 add_msg( _( "You can't see that destination." ) );
7666 }
7667 auto route = m.route( u.pos(), u.pos() + active_pos, u.get_pathfinding_settings(),
7668 u.get_path_avoid() );
7669 if( route.size() > 1 ) {
7670 route.pop_back();
7671 u.set_destination( route );
7672 break;
7673 } else {
7674 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't travel there." ) );
7675 }
7676 }
7677 if( uistate.list_item_sort == 1 ) {
7678 ground_items = item_list;
7679 } else if( uistate.list_item_sort == 2 ) {
7680 std::sort( ground_items.begin(), ground_items.end(), map_item_stack::map_item_stack_sort );
7681 }
7682
7683 if( refilter ) {
7684 refilter = false;
7685 filtered_items = filter_item_stacks( ground_items, sFilter );
7686 highPEnd = list_filter_high_priority( filtered_items, list_item_upvote );
7687 lowPStart = list_filter_low_priority( filtered_items, highPEnd, list_item_downvote );
7688 iActive = 0;
7689 page_num = 0;
7690 iItemNum = filtered_items.size();
7691 }
7692
7693 if( addcategory ) {
7694 addcategory = false;
7695 iCatSortNum = 0;
7696 mSortCategory.clear();
7697 if( highPEnd > 0 ) {
7698 mSortCategory[0] = _( "HIGH PRIORITY" );
7699 iCatSortNum++;
7700 }
7701 std::string last_cat_name;
7702 for( int i = std::max( 0, highPEnd );
7703 i < std::min( lowPStart, static_cast<int>( filtered_items.size() ) ); i++ ) {
7704 const std::string &cat_name = filtered_items[i].example->get_category().name();
7705 if( cat_name != last_cat_name ) {
7706 mSortCategory[i + iCatSortNum++] = cat_name;
7707 last_cat_name = cat_name;
7708 }
7709 }
7710 if( lowPStart < static_cast<int>( filtered_items.size() ) ) {
7711 mSortCategory[lowPStart + iCatSortNum++] = _( "LOW PRIORITY" );
7712 }
7713 if( !mSortCategory[0].empty() ) {
7714 iActive++;
7715 }
7716 iItemNum = static_cast<int>( filtered_items.size() ) + iCatSortNum;
7717 }
7718
7719 if( action == "UP" ) {
7720 do {
7721 iActive--;
7722
7723 } while( !mSortCategory[iActive].empty() );
7724 iScrollPos = 0;
7725 page_num = 0;
7726 if( iActive < 0 ) {
7727 iActive = iItemNum - 1;
7728 }
7729 } else if( action == "DOWN" ) {
7730 do {
7731 iActive++;
7732
7733 } while( !mSortCategory[iActive].empty() );
7734 iScrollPos = 0;
7735 page_num = 0;
7736 if( iActive >= iItemNum ) {
7737 iActive = mSortCategory[0].empty() ? 0 : 1;
7738 }
7739 } else if( action == "RIGHT" ) {
7740 if( !filtered_items.empty() && activeItem ) {
7741 if( ++page_num >= static_cast<int>( activeItem->vIG.size() ) ) {
7742 page_num = activeItem->vIG.size() - 1;
7743 }
7744 }
7745 } else if( action == "LEFT" ) {
7746 page_num = std::max( 0, page_num - 1 );
7747 } else if( action == "PAGE_UP" ) {
7748 iScrollPos--;
7749 } else if( action == "PAGE_DOWN" ) {
7750 iScrollPos++;
7751 } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" || action == "PREV_TAB" ) {
7752 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
7753 return game::vmenu_ret::CHANGE_TAB;
7754 }
7755
7756 active_pos = tripoint_zero;
7757 activeItem = nullptr;
7758
7759 if( mSortCategory[iActive].empty() ) {
7760 auto iter = filtered_items.begin();
7761 for( int iNum = 0; iter != filtered_items.end() && iNum < iActive; iNum++ ) {
7762 if( mSortCategory[iNum].empty() ) {
7763 ++iter;
7764 }
7765 }
7766 if( iter != filtered_items.end() ) {
7767 active_pos = iter->vIG[page_num].pos;
7768 activeItem = &( *iter );
7769 }
7770 }
7771
7772 if( activeItem ) {
7773 centerlistview( active_pos, width );
7774 trail_start = u.pos();
7775 trail_end = u.pos() + active_pos;
7776 // Actually accessed from the terrain overlay callback `trail_cb` in the
7777 // call to `ui_manager::redraw`.
7778 //NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores)
7779 trail_end_x = true;
7780 } else {
7781 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
7782 trail_start = trail_end = cata::nullopt;
7783 }
7784 invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
7785
7786 ui_manager::redraw();
7787
7788 action = ctxt.handle_input();
7789 } while( action != "QUIT" );
7790
7791 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
7792 return game::vmenu_ret::QUIT;
7793}
7794
7795game::vmenu_ret game::list_monsters( const std::vector<Creature *> &monster_list )
7796{
7797 const int iInfoHeight = 15;
7798 const int width = 45;
7799 int offsetX = 0;
7800 int iMaxRows = 0;
7801
7802 catacurses::window w_monsters;
7803 catacurses::window w_monsters_border;
7804 catacurses::window w_monster_info;
7805 catacurses::window w_monster_info_border;
7806
7807 Creature *cCurMon = nullptr;
7808 tripoint iActivePos;
7809
7810 bool hide_ui = false;
7811
7812 ui_adaptor ui;
7813 ui.on_screen_resize( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
7814 if( hide_ui ) {
7815 ui.position( point_zero, point_zero );
7816 } else {
7817 offsetX = TERMX - width;
7818 iMaxRows = TERMY - iInfoHeight - 1;
7819
7820 w_monsters = catacurses::newwin( iMaxRows, width - 2, point( offsetX + 1,
7821 1 ) );
7822 w_monsters_border = catacurses::newwin( iMaxRows + 1, width, point( offsetX,
7823 0 ) );
7824 w_monster_info = catacurses::newwin( iInfoHeight - 2, width - 2,
7825 point( offsetX + 1, TERMY - iInfoHeight + 1 ) );
7826 w_monster_info_border = catacurses::newwin( iInfoHeight, width, point( offsetX,
7827 TERMY - iInfoHeight ) );
7828
7829 if( cCurMon ) {
7830 centerlistview( iActivePos, width );
7831 }
7832
7833 ui.position( point( offsetX, 0 ), point( width, TERMY ) );
7834 }
7835 } );
7836 ui.mark_resize();
7837
7838 const int max_gun_range = u.weapon.gun_range( &u );
7839
7840 const tripoint stored_view_offset = u.view_offset;
7841 u.view_offset = tripoint_zero;
7842
7843 int iActive = 0; // monster index that we're looking at
7844
7845 std::string action;
7846 input_context ctxt( "LIST_MONSTERS" );
7847 ctxt.register_action( "UP", to_translation( "Move cursor up" ) );
7848 ctxt.register_action( "DOWN", to_translation( "Move cursor down" ) );
7849 ctxt.register_action( "NEXT_TAB" );
7850 ctxt.register_action( "PREV_TAB" );
7851 ctxt.register_action( "SAFEMODE_BLACKLIST_ADD" );
7852 ctxt.register_action( "SAFEMODE_BLACKLIST_REMOVE" );
7853 ctxt.register_action( "QUIT" );
7854 if( bVMonsterLookFire ) {
7855 ctxt.register_action( "look" );
7856 ctxt.register_action( "fire" );
7857 }
7858 ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
7859
7860 // first integer is the row the attitude category string is printed in the menu
7861 std::map<int, Creature::Attitude> mSortCategory;
7862
7863 for( int i = 0, last_attitude = -1; i < static_cast<int>( monster_list.size() ); i++ ) {
7864 const auto attitude = monster_list[i]->attitude_to( u );
7865 if( attitude != last_attitude ) {
7866 mSortCategory[i + mSortCategory.size()] = attitude;
7867 last_attitude = attitude;
7868 }
7869 }
7870
7871 ui.on_redraw( [&]( const ui_adaptor & ) {
7872 if( !hide_ui ) {
7873 draw_custom_border( w_monsters_border, true, true, true, true, true, true, LINE_XOXO, LINE_XOXO );
7874 draw_custom_border( w_monster_info_border, true, true, true, true, LINE_XXXO, LINE_XOXX, true,
7875 true );
7876
7877 mvwprintz( w_monsters_border, point( 2, 0 ), c_light_green, "<Tab> " );
7878 wprintz( w_monsters_border, c_white, _( "Monsters" ) );
7879
7880 if( monster_list.empty() ) {
7881 werase( w_monsters );
7882 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( 2, iMaxRows / 3 ), c_white,
7883 _( "You don't see any monsters around you!" ) );
7884 } else {
7885 werase( w_monsters );
7886
7887 const int iNumMonster = monster_list.size();
7888 const int iMenuSize = monster_list.size() + mSortCategory.size();
7889
7890 const int numw = iNumMonster > 999 ? 4 :
7891 iNumMonster > 99 ? 3 :
7892 iNumMonster > 9 ? 2 : 1;
7893
7894 // given the currently selected monster iActive. get the selected row
7895 int iSelPos = iActive;
7896 for( auto &ia : mSortCategory ) {
7897 int index = ia.first;
7898 if( index <= iSelPos ) {
7899 ++iSelPos;
7900 } else {
7901 break;
7902 }
7903 }
7904 int iStartPos = 0;
7905 // use selected row get the start row
7906 calcStartPos( iStartPos, iSelPos, iMaxRows - 1, iMenuSize );
7907
7908 // get first visible monster and category
7909 int iCurMon = iStartPos;
7910 auto CatSortIter = mSortCategory.cbegin();
7911 while( CatSortIter != mSortCategory.cend() && CatSortIter->first < iStartPos ) {
7912 ++CatSortIter;
7913 --iCurMon;
7914 }
7915
7916 const auto endY = std::min<int>( iMaxRows - 1, iMenuSize );
7917 for( int y = 0; y < endY; ++y ) {
7918 if( CatSortIter != mSortCategory.cend() ) {
7919 const int iCurPos = iStartPos + y;
7920 const int iCatPos = CatSortIter->first;
7921 if( iCurPos == iCatPos ) {
7922 const std::string cat_name = Creature::get_attitude_ui_data(
7923 CatSortIter->second ).first.translated();
7924 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( 1, y ), c_magenta, cat_name );
7925 ++CatSortIter;
7926 continue;
7927 }
7928 }
7929 // select current monster
7930 const auto critter = monster_list[iCurMon];
7931 const bool selected = iCurMon == iActive;
7932 ++iCurMon;
7933 if( critter->sees( g->u ) ) {
7934 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( 0, y ), c_yellow, "!" );
7935 }
7936 bool is_npc = false;
7937 const monster *m = dynamic_cast<monster *>( critter );
7938 const npc *p = dynamic_cast<npc *>( critter );
7939 nc_color name_color = critter->basic_symbol_color();
7940
7941 if( selected ) {
7942 name_color = hilite( name_color );
7943 }
7944
7945 if( m != nullptr ) {
7946 trim_and_print( w_monsters, point( 1, y ), width - 26, name_color, m->name() );
7947 } else {
7948 trim_and_print( w_monsters, point( 1, y ), width - 26, name_color, critter->disp_name() );
7949 is_npc = true;
7950 }
7951
7952 if( selected && !get_safemode().empty() ) {
7953 const std::string monName = is_npc ? get_safemode().npc_type_name() : m->name();
7954
7955 std::string sSafemode;
7956 if( get_safemode().has_rule( monName, Creature::A_ANY ) ) {
7957 sSafemode = _( "<R>emove from safemode Blacklist" );
7958 } else {
7959 sSafemode = _( "<A>dd to safemode Blacklist" );
7960 }
7961
7962 shortcut_print( w_monsters, point( 2, getmaxy( w_monsters ) - 1 ),
7963 c_white, c_light_green, sSafemode );
7964 }
7965
7966 nc_color color = c_white;
7967 std::string sText;
7968
7969 if( m != nullptr ) {
7970 m->get_HP_Bar( color, sText );
7971 } else {
7972 std::tie( sText, color ) =
7973 ::get_hp_bar( critter->get_hp(), critter->get_hp_max(), false );
7974 }
7975 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( width - 25, y ), color, sText );
7976
7977 if( m != nullptr ) {
7978 const auto att = m->get_attitude();
7979 sText = att.first;
7980 color = att.second;
7981 } else if( p != nullptr ) {
7982 sText = npc_attitude_name( p->get_attitude() );
7983 color = p->symbol_color();
7984 }
7985 mvwprintz( w_monsters, point( width - 19, y ), color, sText );
7986
7987 const int mon_dist = rl_dist( u.pos(), critter->pos() );
7988 const int numd = mon_dist > 999 ? 4 :
7989 mon_dist > 99 ? 3 :
7990 mon_dist > 9 ? 2 : 1;
7991
7992 trim_and_print( w_monsters, point( width - ( 8 + numd ), y ), 6 + numd,
7993 selected ? c_light_green : c_light_gray,
7994 "%*d %s",
7995 numd, mon_dist,
7996 direction_name_short( direction_from( u.pos(), critter->pos() ) ) );
7997 }
7998
7999 mvwprintz( w_monsters_border, point( ( width / 2 ) - numw - 2, 0 ), c_light_green, " %*d", numw,
8000 iActive + 1 );
8001 wprintz( w_monsters_border, c_white, " / %*d ", numw, static_cast<int>( monster_list.size() ) );
8002
8003 werase( w_monster_info );
8004 if( cCurMon ) {
8005 cCurMon->print_info( w_monster_info, 1, iInfoHeight - 3, 1 );
8006 }
8007
8008 draw_custom_border( w_monster_info_border, true, true, true, true, LINE_XXXO, LINE_XOXX, true,
8009 true );
8010
8011 if( bVMonsterLookFire ) {
8012 mvwprintw( w_monster_info_border, point_east, "< " );
8013 wprintz( w_monster_info_border, c_light_green, ctxt.press_x( "look" ) );
8014 wprintz( w_monster_info_border, c_light_gray, " %s", _( "to look around" ) );
8015
8016 if( cCurMon && rl_dist( u.pos(), cCurMon->pos() ) <= max_gun_range ) {
8017 wprintw( w_monster_info_border, " " );
8018 wprintz( w_monster_info_border, c_light_green, ctxt.press_x( "fire" ) );
8019 wprintz( w_monster_info_border, c_light_gray, " %s", _( "to shoot" ) );
8020 }
8021 wprintw( w_monster_info_border, " >" );
8022 }
8023
8024 draw_scrollbar( w_monsters_border, iActive, iMaxRows, static_cast<int>( monster_list.size() ),
8025 point_south );
8026 }
8027
8028 wnoutrefresh( w_monsters_border );
8029 wnoutrefresh( w_monster_info_border );
8030 wnoutrefresh( w_monsters );
8031 wnoutrefresh( w_monster_info );
8032 }
8033 } );
8034
8035 cata::optional<tripoint> trail_start;
8036 cata::optional<tripoint> trail_end;
8037 bool trail_end_x = false;
8038 shared_ptr_fast<draw_callback_t> trail_cb = create_trail_callback( trail_start, trail_end,
8039 trail_end_x );
8040 add_draw_callback( trail_cb );
8041
8042 do {
8043 if( action == "UP" ) {
8044 iActive--;
8045 if( iActive < 0 ) {
8046 if( monster_list.empty() ) {
8047 iActive = 0;
8048 } else {
8049 iActive = static_cast<int>( monster_list.size() ) - 1;
8050 }
8051 }
8052 } else if( action == "DOWN" ) {
8053 iActive++;
8054 if( iActive >= static_cast<int>( monster_list.size() ) ) {
8055 iActive = 0;
8056 }
8057 } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" || action == "PREV_TAB" ) {
8058 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
8059 return game::vmenu_ret::CHANGE_TAB;
8060 } else if( action == "SAFEMODE_BLACKLIST_REMOVE" ) {
8061 const auto m = dynamic_cast<monster *>( cCurMon );
8062 const std::string monName = ( m != nullptr ) ? m->name() : "human";
8063
8064 if( get_safemode().has_rule( monName, Creature::A_ANY ) ) {
8065 get_safemode().remove_rule( monName, Creature::A_ANY );
8066 }
8067 } else if( action == "SAFEMODE_BLACKLIST_ADD" ) {
8068 if( !get_safemode().empty() ) {
8069 const auto m = dynamic_cast<monster *>( cCurMon );
8070 const std::string monName = ( m != nullptr ) ? m->name() : "human";
8071
8072 get_safemode().add_rule( monName, Creature::A_ANY, get_option<int>( "SAFEMODEPROXIMITY" ),
8073 RULE_BLACKLISTED );
8074 }
8075 } else if( action == "look" ) {
8076 hide_ui = true;
8077 ui.mark_resize();
8078 look_around();
8079 hide_ui = false;
8080 ui.mark_resize();
8081 } else if( action == "fire" ) {
8082 if( cCurMon != nullptr && rl_dist( u.pos(), cCurMon->pos() ) <= max_gun_range ) {
8083 u.last_target = shared_from( *cCurMon );
8084 u.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
8085 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
8086 return game::vmenu_ret::FIRE;
8087 }
8088 }
8089
8090 if( iActive >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( iActive ) < monster_list.size() ) {
8091 cCurMon = monster_list[iActive];
8092 iActivePos = cCurMon->pos() - u.pos();
8093 centerlistview( iActivePos, width );
8094 trail_start = u.pos();
8095 trail_end = cCurMon->pos();
8096 // Actually accessed from the terrain overlay callback `trail_cb` in the
8097 // call to `ui_manager::redraw`.
8098 //NOLINTNEXTLINE(clang-analyzer-deadcode.DeadStores)
8099 trail_end_x = false;
8100 } else {
8101 cCurMon = nullptr;
8102 iActivePos = tripoint_zero;
8103 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
8104 trail_start = trail_end = cata::nullopt;
8105 }
8106 invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
8107
8108 ui_manager::redraw();
8109
8110 action = ctxt.handle_input();
8111 } while( action != "QUIT" );
8112
8113 u.view_offset = stored_view_offset;
8114
8115 return game::vmenu_ret::QUIT;
8116}
8117
8118void game::drop()
8119{
8120 u.drop( game_menus::inv::multidrop( u ), u.pos() );
8121}
8122
8123void game::drop_in_direction()
8124{
8125 if( const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt = choose_adjacent( _( "Drop where?" ) ) ) {
8126 u.drop( game_menus::inv::multidrop( u ), *pnt );
8127 }
8128}
8129
8130// Used to set up the first Hotkey in the display set
8131static int get_initial_hotkey( const size_t menu_index )
8132{
8133 return ( menu_index == 0 ) ? hotkey_for_action( ACTION_BUTCHER ) : -1;
8134}
8135
8136// Returns a vector of pairs.
8137// Pair.first is the iterator to the first item with a unique tname.
8138// Pair.second is the number of equivalent items per unique tname
8139// There are options for optimization here, but the function is hit infrequently
8140// enough that optimizing now is not a useful time expenditure.
8141static std::vector<std::pair<map_stack::iterator, int>> generate_butcher_stack_display(
8142 const std::vector<map_stack::iterator> &its )
8143{
8144 std::vector<std::pair<map_stack::iterator, int>> result;
8145 std::vector<std::string> result_strings;
8146 result.reserve( its.size() );
8147 result_strings.reserve( its.size() );
8148
8149 for( const map_stack::iterator &it : its ) {
8150 const std::string tname = it->tname();
8151 size_t s = 0;
8152 // Search for the index with a string equivalent to tname
8153 for( ; s < result_strings.size(); ++s ) {
8154 if( result_strings[s] == tname ) {
8155 break;
8156 }
8157 }
8158 // If none is found, this is a unique tname so we need to add
8159 // the tname to string vector, and make an empty result pair.
8160 // Has the side effect of making 's' a valid index
8161 if( s == result_strings.size() ) {
8162 // make a new entry
8163 result.emplace_back( it, 0 );
8164 // Also push new entry string
8165 result_strings.push_back( tname );
8166 }
8167 // Increase count result pair at index s
8168 ++result[s].second;
8169 }
8170
8171 return result;
8172}
8173
8174// Corpses are always individual items
8175// Just add them individually to the menu
8176static void add_corpses( uilist &menu, const std::vector<map_stack::iterator> &its,
8177 size_t &menu_index )
8178{
8179 int hotkey = get_initial_hotkey( menu_index );
8180
8181 for( const map_stack::iterator &it : its ) {
8182 menu.addentry( menu_index++, true, hotkey, it->get_mtype()->nname() );
8183 hotkey = -1;
8184 }
8185}
8186
8187// Salvagables stack so we need to pass in a stack vector rather than an item index vector
8188static void add_salvagables( uilist &menu,
8189 const std::vector<std::pair<map_stack::iterator, int>> &stacks,
8190 size_t &menu_index, const salvage_actor &salvage_iuse )
8191{
8192 if( !stacks.empty() ) {
8193 int hotkey = get_initial_hotkey( menu_index );
8194
8195 for( const auto &stack : stacks ) {
8196 const item &it = *stack.first;
8197
8198 //~ Name and number of items listed for cutting up
8199 const auto &msg = string_format( pgettext( "butchery menu", "Cut up %s (%d)" ),
8200 it.tname(), stack.second );
8201 menu.addentry_col( menu_index++, true, hotkey, msg,
8202 to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_turns( salvage_iuse.time_to_cut_up( it ) / 100 ) ) );
8203 hotkey = -1;
8204 }
8205 }
8206}
8207
8208// Disassemblables stack so we need to pass in a stack vector rather than an item index vector
8209static void add_disassemblables( uilist &menu,
8210 const std::vector<std::pair<map_stack::iterator, int>> &stacks, size_t &menu_index )
8211{
8212 if( !stacks.empty() ) {
8213 int hotkey = get_initial_hotkey( menu_index );
8214
8215 for( const auto &stack : stacks ) {
8216 const item &it = *stack.first;
8217
8218 //~ Name, number of items and time to complete disassembling
8219 const auto &msg = string_format( pgettext( "butchery menu", "%s (%d)" ),
8220 it.tname(), stack.second );
8221 menu.addentry_col( menu_index++, true, hotkey, msg,
8222 to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_turns( recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft(
8223 it.typeId() ).time / 100 ) ) );
8224 hotkey = -1;
8225 }
8226 }
8227}
8228
8229// Butchery sub-menu and time calculation
8230static void butcher_submenu( const std::vector<map_stack::iterator> &corpses, int corpse = -1 )
8231{
8232 avatar &you = get_avatar();
8233 const inventory &inv = you.crafting_inventory();
8234
8235 const int factor = inv.max_quality( quality_id( "BUTCHER" ) );
8236 const std::string msg_inv = factor > INT_MIN
8237 ? string_format( _( "Your best tool has <color_cyan>%d butchering</color>." ), factor )
8238 : _( "You have no butchering tool." );
8239
8240 const int factor_diss = inv.max_quality( quality_id( "CUT_FINE" ) );
8241 const std::string msg_inv_diss = factor_diss > INT_MIN
8242 ? string_format( _( "Your best tool has <color_cyan>%d fine cutting</color>." ), factor_diss )
8243 : _( "You have no fine cutting tool." );
8244
8245 auto cut_time = [&]( enum butcher_type bt ) {
8246 int time_to_cut = 0;
8247 if( corpse != -1 ) {
8248 time_to_cut = butcher_time_to_cut( inv, *corpses[corpse], bt );
8249 } else {
8250 for( const map_stack::iterator &it : corpses ) {
8251 time_to_cut += butcher_time_to_cut( inv, *it, bt );
8252 }
8253 }
8254 return to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_turns( time_to_cut / 100 ) );
8255 };
8256 auto info_on_action = [&]( butcher_type type ) {
8257 int corpse_index = corpse == -1 ? 0 : corpse;
8258 butchery_setup setup = consider_butchery( *corpses[corpse_index], you, type );
8259 std::string out;
8260 for( const std::string &problem : setup.problems ) {
8261 out += "\n" + colorize( problem, c_red );
8262 }
8263 return out;
8264 };
8265 const bool enough_light = character_funcs::can_see_fine_details( you );
8266
8267 bool has_skin = false;
8268 bool has_organs = false;
8269
8270 if( corpse != -1 ) {
8271 const mtype *dead_mon = corpses[corpse]->get_mtype();
8272 if( dead_mon ) {
8273 for( const harvest_entry &entry : dead_mon->harvest.obj() ) {
8274 if( entry.type == "skin" ) {
8275 has_skin = true;
8276 }
8277 if( entry.type == "offal" ) {
8278 has_organs = true;
8279 }
8280 }
8281 }
8282 }
8283
8284 uilist smenu;
8285 smenu.desc_enabled = true;
8286 smenu.text = _( "Choose type of butchery:" );
8287
8288 const std::string cannot_see = colorize( _( "can't see!" ), c_red );
8289
8290 smenu.addentry_col( BUTCHER, enough_light, 'B', _( "Quick butchery" ),
8291 enough_light ? cut_time( BUTCHER ) : cannot_see,
8292 string_format( "%s %s%s",
8293 _( "This technique is used when you are in a hurry, "
8294 "but still want to harvest something from the corpse. "
8295 " Yields are lower as you don't try to be precise, "
8296 "but it's useful if you don't want to set up a workshop. "
8297 "Prevents zombies from raising." ),
8298 msg_inv, info_on_action( BUTCHER ).c_str() ) );
8299 smenu.addentry_col( BUTCHER_FULL, enough_light, 'b', _( "Full butchery" ),
8300 enough_light ? cut_time( BUTCHER_FULL ) : cannot_see,
8301 string_format( "%s %s%s",
8302 _( "This technique is used to properly butcher a corpse, "
8303 "and requires a rope & a tree or a butchering rack, "
8304 "a flat surface (for ex. a table, a leather tarp, etc.) "
8305 "and good tools. Yields are plentiful and varied, "
8306 "but it is time consuming." ),
8307 msg_inv, info_on_action( BUTCHER_FULL ).c_str() ) );
8308 smenu.addentry_col( F_DRESS, enough_light &&
8309 has_organs, 'f', _( "Field dress corpse" ),
8310 enough_light ? ( has_organs ? cut_time( F_DRESS ) : colorize( _( "has no organs" ),
8311 c_red ) ) : cannot_see,
8312 string_format( "%s %s%s",
8313 _( "Technique that involves removing internal organs and "
8314 "viscera to protect the corpse from rotting from inside. "
8315 "Yields internal organs. Carcass will be lighter and will "
8316 "stay fresh longer. Can be combined with other methods for "
8317 "better effects." ),
8318 msg_inv, info_on_action( F_DRESS ).c_str() ) );
8319 smenu.addentry_col( SKIN, enough_light &&
8320 has_skin, 's', _( "Skin corpse" ),
8321 enough_light ? ( has_skin ? cut_time( SKIN ) : colorize( _( "has no skin" ), c_red ) ) : cannot_see,
8322 string_format( "%s %s%s",
8323 _( "Skinning a corpse is an involved and careful process that "
8324 "usually takes some time. You need skill and an appropriately "
8325 "sharp and precise knife to do a good job. Some corpses are "
8326 "too small to yield a full-sized hide and will instead produce "
8327 "scraps that can be used in other ways." ),
8328 msg_inv, info_on_action( SKIN ).c_str() ) );
8329 smenu.addentry_col( QUARTER, enough_light, 'k', _( "Quarter corpse" ),
8330 enough_light ? cut_time( QUARTER ) : cannot_see,
8331 string_format( "%s %s%s",
8332 _( "By quartering a previously field dressed corpse you will "
8333 "acquire four parts with reduced weight and volume. It "
8334 "may help in transporting large game. This action destroys "
8335 "skin, hide, pelt, etc., so don't use it if you want to "
8336 "harvest them later." ),
8337 msg_inv, info_on_action( QUARTER ).c_str() ) );
8338 smenu.addentry_col( DISMEMBER, true, 'm', _( "Dismember corpse" ), cut_time( DISMEMBER ),
8339 string_format( "%s %s%s",
8340 _( "If you're aiming to just destroy a body outright and don't "
8341 "care about harvesting it, dismembering it will hack it apart "
8342 "in a very short amount of time but yields little to no usable flesh." ),
8343 msg_inv, info_on_action( DISMEMBER ).c_str() ) );
8344 smenu.addentry_col( DISSECT, enough_light, 'd', _( "Dissect corpse" ),
8345 enough_light ? cut_time( DISSECT ) : cannot_see,
8346 string_format( "%s %s%s",
8347 _( "By careful dissection of the corpse, you will examine it for "
8348 "possible bionic implants, or discrete organs and harvest them "
8349 "if possible. Requires scalpel-grade cutting tools, and ruins "
8350 "the corpse. Your medical knowledge is most useful here." ),
8351 msg_inv_diss, info_on_action( DISSECT ).c_str() ) );
8352 smenu.query();
8353 switch( smenu.ret ) {
8354 case BUTCHER:
8355 you.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_BUTCHER" ), 0, true );
8356 break;
8357 case BUTCHER_FULL:
8358 you.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_BUTCHER_FULL" ), 0, true );
8359 break;
8360 case F_DRESS:
8361 you.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_FIELD_DRESS" ), 0, true );
8362 break;
8363 case SKIN:
8364 you.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_SKIN" ), 0, true );
8365 break;
8366 case QUARTER:
8367 you.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_QUARTER" ), 0, true );
8368 break;
8369 case DISMEMBER:
8370 you.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_DISMEMBER" ), 0, true );
8371 break;
8372 case DISSECT:
8373 you.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_DISSECT" ), 0, true );
8374 break;
8375 default:
8376 return;
8377 }
8378}
8379
8380void game::butcher()
8381{
8382 static const std::string salvage_string = "salvage";
8383 if( u.controlling_vehicle ) {
8384 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't butcher while driving!" ) );
8385 return;
8386 }
8387
8388 const int factor = u.max_quality( quality_id( "BUTCHER" ) );
8389 const int factorD = u.max_quality( quality_id( "CUT_FINE" ) );
8390 const std::string no_knife_msg = _( "You don't have a butchering tool." );
8391 const std::string no_corpse_msg = _( "There are no corpses here to butcher." );
8392
8393 //You can't butcher on sealed terrain- you have to smash/shovel/etc it open first
8394 if( m.has_flag( "SEALED", u.pos() ) ) {
8395 if( m.sees_some_items( u.pos(), u ) ) {
8396 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't access the items here." ) );
8397 } else if( factor > INT_MIN || factorD > INT_MIN ) {
8398 add_msg( m_info, no_corpse_msg );
8399 } else {
8400 add_msg( m_info, no_knife_msg );
8401 }
8402 return;
8403 }
8404
8405 const item *first_item_without_tools = nullptr;
8406 // Indices of relevant items
8407 std::vector<map_stack::iterator> corpses;
8408 std::vector<map_stack::iterator> disassembles;
8409 std::vector<map_stack::iterator> salvageables;
8410 map_stack items = m.i_at( u.pos() );
8411 const inventory &crafting_inv = u.crafting_inventory();
8412
8413 // TODO: Properly handle different material whitelists
8414 // TODO: Improve quality of this section
8415 auto salvage_filter = []( item it ) {
8416 const auto usable = it.get_usable_item( salvage_string );
8417 return usable != nullptr;
8418 };
8419
8420 std::vector< item * > salvage_tools = u.items_with( salvage_filter );
8421 int salvage_tool_index = INT_MIN;
8422 item *salvage_tool = nullptr;
8423 const salvage_actor *salvage_iuse = nullptr;
8424 if( !salvage_tools.empty() ) {
8425 salvage_tool = salvage_tools.front();
8426 salvage_tool_index = u.get_item_position( salvage_tool );
8427 item *usable = salvage_tool->get_usable_item( salvage_string );
8428 salvage_iuse = dynamic_cast<const salvage_actor *>(
8429 usable->get_use( salvage_string )->get_actor_ptr() );
8430 }
8431
8432 // Reserve capacity for each to hold entire item set if necessary to prevent
8433 // reallocations later on
8434 corpses.reserve( items.size() );
8435 salvageables.reserve( items.size() );
8436 disassembles.reserve( items.size() );
8437
8438 // Split into corpses, disassemble-able, and salvageable items
8439 // It's not much additional work to just generate a corpse list and
8440 // clear it later, but does make the splitting process nicer.
8441 for( map_stack::iterator it = items.begin(); it != items.end(); ++it ) {
8442 if( it->is_corpse() ) {
8443 corpses.push_back( it );
8444 } else {
8445 if( ( salvage_tool_index != INT_MIN ) && salvage_iuse->valid_to_cut_up( *it ) ) {
8446 salvageables.push_back( it );
8447 }
8448 if( crafting::can_disassemble( u, *it, crafting_inv ).success() ) {
8449 disassembles.push_back( it );
8450 } else if( !first_item_without_tools ) {
8451 first_item_without_tools = &*it;
8452 }
8453 }
8454 }
8455
8456 // Clear corpses if butcher and dissect factors are INT_MIN
8457 if( factor == INT_MIN && factorD == INT_MIN ) {
8458 corpses.clear();
8459 }
8460
8461 if( corpses.empty() && disassembles.empty() && salvageables.empty() ) {
8462 if( factor > INT_MIN || factorD > INT_MIN ) {
8463 add_msg( m_info, no_corpse_msg );
8464 } else {
8465 add_msg( m_info, no_knife_msg );
8466 }
8467
8468 if( first_item_without_tools ) {
8469 add_msg( m_info, _( "You don't have the necessary tools to disassemble any items here." ) );
8470 // Just for the "You need x to disassemble y" messages
8471 const auto ret = crafting::can_disassemble( u, *first_item_without_tools, crafting_inv );
8472 if( !ret.success() ) {
8473 add_msg( m_info, "%s", ret.c_str() );
8474 }
8475 }
8476 return;
8477 }
8478
8479 Creature *hostile_critter = is_hostile_very_close();
8480 if( hostile_critter != nullptr ) {
8481 if( !query_yn( _( "You see %s nearby! Start butchering anyway?" ),
8482 hostile_critter->disp_name() ) ) {
8483 return;
8484 }
8485 }
8486
8487 // Magic indices for special butcher options
8488 enum : int {
8489 MULTISALVAGE = MAX_ITEM_IN_SQUARE + 1,
8490 MULTIBUTCHER,
8491 MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ONE,
8492 MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ALL,
8493 NUM_BUTCHER_ACTIONS
8494 };
8495 // What are we butchering (i.e.. which vector to pick indices from)
8496 enum {
8497 BUTCHER_CORPSE,
8498 BUTCHER_DISASSEMBLE,
8499 BUTCHER_SALVAGE,
8500 BUTCHER_OTHER // For multisalvage etc.
8501 } butcher_select = BUTCHER_CORPSE;
8502 // Index to std::vector of iterators...
8503 int indexer_index = 0;
8504
8505 // Generate the indexed stacks so we can display them nicely
8506 const auto disassembly_stacks = generate_butcher_stack_display( disassembles );
8507 const auto salvage_stacks = generate_butcher_stack_display( salvageables );
8508 // Always ask before cutting up/disassembly, but not before butchery
8509 size_t ret = 0;
8510 if( !corpses.empty() || !disassembles.empty() || !salvageables.empty() ) {
8511 uilist kmenu;
8512 kmenu.text = _( "Choose corpse to butcher / item to disassemble" );
8513
8514 size_t i = 0;
8515 // Add corpses, disassembleables, and salvagables to the UI
8516 add_corpses( kmenu, corpses, i );
8517 add_disassemblables( kmenu, disassembly_stacks, i );
8518 if( salvage_iuse && !salvageables.empty() ) {
8519 add_salvagables( kmenu, salvage_stacks, i, *salvage_iuse );
8520 }
8521
8522 if( corpses.size() > 1 ) {
8523 kmenu.addentry( MULTIBUTCHER, true, 'b', _( "Butcher everything" ) );
8524 }
8525 if( disassembles.size() > 1 ) {
8526 int time_to_disassemble = 0;
8527 int time_to_disassemble_all = 0;
8528 for( const auto &stack : disassembly_stacks ) {
8529 const int time = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( stack.first->typeId() ).time;
8530 time_to_disassemble += time;
8531 time_to_disassemble_all += time * stack.second;
8532 }
8533
8534 kmenu.addentry_col( MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ONE, true, 'D', _( "Disassemble everything once" ),
8535 to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_turns( time_to_disassemble / 100 ) ) );
8536 kmenu.addentry_col( MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ALL, true, 'd', _( "Disassemble everything recursively" ),
8537 to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_turns( time_to_disassemble_all / 100 ) ) );
8538 }
8539 if( salvage_iuse && salvageables.size() > 1 ) {
8540 int time_to_salvage = 0;
8541 for( const auto &stack : salvage_stacks ) {
8542 time_to_salvage += salvage_iuse->time_to_cut_up( *stack.first ) * stack.second;
8543 }
8544
8545 kmenu.addentry_col( MULTISALVAGE, true, 'z', _( "Cut up everything" ),
8546 to_string_clipped( time_duration::from_turns( time_to_salvage / 100 ) ) );
8547 }
8548
8549 kmenu.query();
8550
8551 if( kmenu.ret < 0 || kmenu.ret >= NUM_BUTCHER_ACTIONS ) {
8552 return;
8553 }
8554
8555 ret = static_cast<size_t>( kmenu.ret );
8556 if( ret >= MULTISALVAGE && ret < NUM_BUTCHER_ACTIONS ) {
8557 butcher_select = BUTCHER_OTHER;
8558 indexer_index = ret;
8559 } else if( ret < corpses.size() ) {
8560 butcher_select = BUTCHER_CORPSE;
8561 indexer_index = ret;
8562 } else if( ret < corpses.size() + disassembly_stacks.size() ) {
8563 butcher_select = BUTCHER_DISASSEMBLE;
8564 indexer_index = ret - corpses.size();
8565 } else if( ret < corpses.size() + disassembly_stacks.size() + salvage_stacks.size() ) {
8566 butcher_select = BUTCHER_SALVAGE;
8567 indexer_index = ret - corpses.size() - disassembly_stacks.size();
8568 } else {
8569 debugmsg( "Invalid butchery index: %d", ret );
8570 return;
8571 }
8572 }
8573
8574 if( !u.has_morale_to_craft() ) {
8575 if( butcher_select == BUTCHER_CORPSE || indexer_index == MULTIBUTCHER ) {
8576 add_msg( m_info,
8577 _( "You are not in the mood and the prospect of guts and blood on your hands convinces you to turn away." ) );
8578 } else {
8579 add_msg( m_info,
8580 _( "You are not in the mood and the prospect of work stops you before you begin." ) );
8581 }
8582 return;
8583 }
8584 const auto helpers = u.get_crafting_helpers( 3 );
8585 for( const npc *np : helpers ) {
8586 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s helps with this task" ), np->name );
8587 }
8588 switch( butcher_select ) {
8589 case BUTCHER_OTHER:
8590 switch( indexer_index ) {
8591 case MULTISALVAGE:
8592 u.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_LONGSALVAGE" ), 0, salvage_tool_index );
8593 break;
8594 case MULTIBUTCHER:
8595 butcher_submenu( corpses );
8596 for( map_stack::iterator &it : corpses ) {
8597 u.activity.targets.emplace_back( map_cursor( u.pos() ), &*it );
8598 }
8599 break;
8600 case MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ONE:
8601 crafting::disassemble_all( u, false );
8602 break;
8603 case MULTIDISASSEMBLE_ALL:
8604 crafting::disassemble_all( u, true );
8605 break;
8606 default:
8607 debugmsg( "Invalid butchery type: %d", indexer_index );
8608 return;
8609 }
8610 break;
8611 case BUTCHER_CORPSE: {
8612 butcher_submenu( corpses, indexer_index );
8613 u.activity.targets.emplace_back( map_cursor( u.pos() ), &*corpses[indexer_index] );
8614 }
8615 break;
8616 case BUTCHER_DISASSEMBLE: {
8617 // Pick index of first item in the disassembly stack
8618 item *const target = &*disassembly_stacks[indexer_index].first;
8619 crafting::disassemble( u, item_location( map_cursor( u.pos() ), target ) );
8620 }
8621 break;
8622 case BUTCHER_SALVAGE: {
8623 if( !salvage_iuse || !salvage_tool ) {
8624 debugmsg( "null salve_iuse or salvage_tool" );
8625 } else {
8626 // Pick index of first item in the salvage stack
8627 item *const target = &*salvage_stacks[indexer_index].first;
8628 item_location item_loc( map_cursor( u.pos() ), target );
8629 salvage_iuse->cut_up( u, *salvage_tool, item_loc );
8630 }
8631 }
8632 break;
8633 }
8634}
8635
8636bool game::check_safe_mode_allowed( bool repeat_safe_mode_warnings )
8637{
8638 if( !repeat_safe_mode_warnings && safe_mode_warning_logged ) {
8639 // Already warned player since safe_mode_warning_logged is set.
8640 return false;
8641 }
8642
8643 std::string msg_ignore = press_x( ACTION_IGNORE_ENEMY );
8644 if( !msg_ignore.empty() ) {
8645 std::wstring msg_ignore_wide = utf8_to_wstr( msg_ignore );
8646 // Operate on a wide-char basis to prevent corrupted multi-byte string
8647 msg_ignore_wide[0] = towlower( msg_ignore_wide[0] );
8648 msg_ignore = wstr_to_utf8( msg_ignore_wide );
8649 }
8650
8651 if( u.has_effect( effect_laserlocked ) ) {
8652 // Automatic and mandatory safemode. Make BLOODY sure the player notices!
8653 if( u.get_int_base() < 5 || u.has_trait( trait_id( "PROF_CHURL" ) ) ) {
8654 add_msg( game_message_params{ m_warning, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
8655 _( "There's an angry red dot on your body, %s to brush it off." ), msg_ignore );
8656 } else {
8657 add_msg( game_message_params{ m_warning, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
8658 _( "You are being laser-targeted, %s to ignore." ), msg_ignore );
8659 }
8660 safe_mode_warning_logged = true;
8661 return false;
8662 }
8663 if( safe_mode != SAFE_MODE_STOP ) {
8664 return true;
8665 }
8666 // Currently driving around, ignore the monster, they have no chance against a proper car anyway (-:
8667 if( u.controlling_vehicle && !get_option<bool>( "SAFEMODEVEH" ) ) {
8668 return true;
8669 }
8670 // Monsters around and we don't want to run
8671 std::string spotted_creature_name;
8672 const monster_visible_info &mon_visible = u.get_mon_visible();
8673 const auto &new_seen_mon = mon_visible.new_seen_mon;
8674
8675 if( new_seen_mon.empty() ) {
8676 // naming consistent with code in game::mon_info
8677 spotted_creature_name = _( "a survivor" );
8678 get_safemode().lastmon_whitelist = get_safemode().npc_type_name();
8679 } else {
8680 spotted_creature_name = new_seen_mon.back()->name();
8681 get_safemode().lastmon_whitelist = spotted_creature_name;
8682 }
8683
8684 std::string whitelist;
8685 if( !get_safemode().empty() ) {
8686 whitelist = string_format( _( " or %s to whitelist the monster" ),
8687 press_x( ACTION_WHITELIST_ENEMY ) );
8688 }
8689
8690 const std::string msg_safe_mode = press_x( ACTION_TOGGLE_SAFEMODE );
8691 add_msg( game_message_params{ m_warning, gmf_bypass_cooldown },
8692 _( "Spotted %1$s--safe mode is on! (%2$s to turn it off, %3$s to ignore monster%4$s)" ),
8693 spotted_creature_name, msg_safe_mode, msg_ignore, whitelist );
8694 safe_mode_warning_logged = true;
8695 return false;
8696}
8697
8698void game::set_safe_mode( safe_mode_type mode )
8699{
8700 safe_mode = mode;
8701 safe_mode_warning_logged = false;
8702}
8703
8704bool game::disable_robot( const tripoint &p )
8705{
8706 monster *const mon_ptr = critter_at<monster>( p );
8707 if( !mon_ptr ) {
8708 return false;
8709 }
8710 monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
8711 if( critter.friendly == 0 || critter.has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ||
8712 ( critter.has_flag( MF_PAY_BOT ) && critter.has_effect( effect_paid ) ) ) {
8713 // Can only disable / reprogram friendly monsters
8714 return false;
8715 }
8716 const auto mid = critter.type->id;
8717 const auto mon_item_id = critter.type->revert_to_itype;
8718 if( !mon_item_id.is_empty() &&
8719 query_yn( _( "Deactivate the %s?" ), critter.name() ) ) {
8720
8721 u.moves -= 100;
8722 m.add_item_or_charges( p, critter.to_item() );
8723 if( !critter.has_flag( MF_INTERIOR_AMMO ) ) {
8724 for( auto &ammodef : critter.ammo ) {
8725 if( ammodef.second > 0 ) {
8726 m.spawn_item( p.xy(), ammodef.first, 1, ammodef.second, calendar::turn );
8727 }
8728 }
8729 }
8730 remove_zombie( critter );
8731 return true;
8732 }
8733 // Manhacks are special, they have their own menu here.
8734 if( mid == mon_manhack ) {
8735 int choice = UILIST_CANCEL;
8736 if( critter.has_effect( effect_docile ) ) {
8737 choice = uilist( _( "Reprogram the manhack?" ), { _( "Engage targets." ) } );
8738 } else {
8739 choice = uilist( _( "Reprogram the manhack?" ), { _( "Follow me." ) } );
8740 }
8741 switch( choice ) {
8742 case 0:
8743 if( critter.has_effect( effect_docile ) ) {
8744 critter.remove_effect( effect_docile );
8745 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
8746 add_msg( _( "The %s hovers momentarily as it surveys the area." ),
8747 critter.name() );
8748 }
8749 } else {
8750 critter.add_effect( effect_docile, 1_turns, num_bp );
8751 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
8752 add_msg( _( "The %s lets out a whirring noise and starts to follow you." ),
8753 critter.name() );
8754 }
8755 }
8756 u.moves -= 100;
8757 return true;
8758 default:
8759 break;
8760 }
8761 }
8762 return false;
8763}
8764
8765bool game::is_dangerous_tile( const tripoint &dest_loc ) const
8766{
8767 return !( get_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ).empty() );
8768}
8769
8770bool game::prompt_dangerous_tile( const tripoint &dest_loc ) const
8771{
8772 std::vector<std::string> harmful_stuff = get_dangerous_tile( dest_loc );
8773
8774 if( !harmful_stuff.empty() &&
8775 !query_yn( _( "Really step into %s?" ), enumerate_as_string( harmful_stuff ) ) ) {
8776 return false;
8777 }
8778 if( !harmful_stuff.empty() && u.is_mounted() &&
8779 m.tr_at( dest_loc ).loadid == tr_ledge ) {
8780 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your %s refuses to move over that ledge!" ),
8781 u.mounted_creature->get_name() );
8782 return false;
8783 }
8784 return true;
8785}
8786
8787std::vector<std::string> game::get_dangerous_tile( const tripoint &dest_loc ) const
8788{
8789 std::vector<std::string> harmful_stuff;
8790 const auto fields_here = m.field_at( u.pos() );
8791 for( const auto &e : m.field_at( dest_loc ) ) {
8792 // warn before moving into a dangerous field except when already standing within a similar field
8793 if( u.is_dangerous_field( e.second ) && fields_here.find_field( e.first ) == nullptr ) {
8794 harmful_stuff.push_back( e.second.name() );
8795 }
8796 }
8797
8798 if( !u.is_blind() ) {
8799 const trap &tr = m.tr_at( dest_loc );
8800 const bool boardable = static_cast<bool>( m.veh_at( dest_loc ).part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE",
8801 true ) );
8802 // HACK: Hack for now, later ledge should stop being a trap
8803 // Note: in non-z-level mode, ledges obey different rules and so should be handled as regular traps
8804 if( tr.loadid == tr_ledge && m.has_zlevels() ) {
8805 if( !boardable ) {
8806 harmful_stuff.emplace_back( tr.name() );
8807 }
8808 } else if( tr.can_see( dest_loc, u ) && !tr.is_benign() && !boardable ) {
8809 harmful_stuff.emplace_back( tr.name() );
8810 }
8811
8812 static const std::set< body_part > sharp_bps = {
8813 bp_eyes, bp_mouth, bp_head, bp_leg_l, bp_leg_r, bp_foot_l, bp_foot_r, bp_arm_l, bp_arm_r,
8814 bp_hand_l, bp_hand_r, bp_torso
8815 };
8816
8817 const auto sharp_bp_check = [this]( body_part bp ) {
8818 return u.immune_to( bp, { DT_CUT, 10 } );
8819 };
8820
8821 if( m.has_flag( "ROUGH", dest_loc ) && !m.has_flag( "ROUGH", u.pos() ) && !boardable &&
8822 ( u.get_armor_bash( bodypart_id( "foot_l" ) ) < 5 ||
8823 u.get_armor_bash( bodypart_id( "foot_r" ) ) < 5 ) ) {
8824 harmful_stuff.emplace_back( m.name( dest_loc ) );
8825 } else if( m.has_flag( "SHARP", dest_loc ) && !m.has_flag( "SHARP", u.pos() ) && !( u.in_vehicle ||
8826 m.veh_at( dest_loc ) ) &&
8827 u.dex_cur < 78 && !std::all_of( sharp_bps.begin(), sharp_bps.end(), sharp_bp_check ) ) {
8828 harmful_stuff.emplace_back( m.name( dest_loc ) );
8829 }
8830
8831 }
8832
8833 return harmful_stuff;
8834}
8835
8836bool game::walk_move( const tripoint &dest_loc, const bool via_ramp )
8837{
8838 if( m.has_flag_ter( TFLAG_SMALL_PASSAGE, dest_loc ) ) {
8839 if( u.get_size() > MS_MEDIUM ) {
8840 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You can't fit there." ) );
8841 return false; // character too large to fit through a tight passage
8842 }
8843 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
8844 monster *mount = u.mounted_creature.get();
8845 if( mount->get_size() > MS_MEDIUM ) {
8846 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your mount can't fit there." ) );
8847 return false; // char's mount is too large for tight passages
8848 }
8849 }
8850 }
8851
8852 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
8853 auto mons = u.mounted_creature.get();
8854 if( mons->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
8855 if( !mons->check_mech_powered() ) {
8856 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your %s refuses to move as its batteries have been drained." ),
8857 mons->get_name() );
8858 return false;
8859 }
8860 }
8861 if( !mons->move_effects( false ) ) {
8862 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You cannot move as your %s isn't able to move." ), mons->get_name() );
8863 return false;
8864 }
8865 }
8866 const optional_vpart_position vp_here = m.veh_at( u.pos() );
8867 const optional_vpart_position vp_there = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
8868
8869 bool pushing = false; // moving -into- grabbed tile; skip check for move_cost > 0
8870 bool pulling = false; // moving -away- from grabbed tile; check for move_cost > 0
8871 bool shifting_furniture = false; // moving furniture and staying still; skip check for move_cost > 0
8872
8873 const tripoint furn_pos = u.pos() + u.grab_point;
8874 const tripoint furn_dest = dest_loc + u.grab_point;
8875
8876 bool grabbed = u.get_grab_type() != OBJECT_NONE;
8877 if( grabbed ) {
8878 const tripoint dp = dest_loc - u.pos();
8879 pushing = dp == u.grab_point;
8880 pulling = dp == -u.grab_point;
8881 }
8882 if( grabbed && dest_loc.z != u.posz() ) {
8883 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You let go of the grabbed object." ) );
8884 grabbed = false;
8885 u.grab( OBJECT_NONE );
8886 }
8887
8888 // Now make sure we're actually holding something
8889 const vehicle *grabbed_vehicle = nullptr;
8890 if( grabbed && u.get_grab_type() == OBJECT_FURNITURE ) {
8891 // We only care about shifting, because it's the only one that can change our destination
8892 if( m.has_furn( u.pos() + u.grab_point ) ) {
8893 shifting_furniture = !pushing && !pulling;
8894 } else {
8895 // We were grabbing a furniture that isn't there
8896 grabbed = false;
8897 }
8898 } else if( grabbed && u.get_grab_type() == OBJECT_VEHICLE ) {
8899 grabbed_vehicle = veh_pointer_or_null( m.veh_at( u.pos() + u.grab_point ) );
8900 if( grabbed_vehicle == nullptr ) {
8901 // We were grabbing a vehicle that isn't there anymore
8902 grabbed = false;
8903 }
8904 } else if( grabbed ) {
8905 // We were grabbing something WEIRD, let's pretend we weren't
8906 grabbed = false;
8907 }
8908 if( u.grab_point != tripoint_zero && !grabbed ) {
8909 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Can't find grabbed object." ) );
8910 u.grab( OBJECT_NONE );
8911 }
8912
8913 if( m.impassable( dest_loc ) && !pushing && !shifting_furniture ) {
8914 if( vp_there && u.mounted_creature && u.mounted_creature->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
8915 vp_there->vehicle().handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( u ) ) ) {
8916 tripoint diff = dest_loc - u.pos();
8917 if( diff.x < 0 ) {
8918 diff.x -= 2;
8919 } else if( diff.x > 0 ) {
8920 diff.x += 2;
8921 }
8922 if( diff.y < 0 ) {
8923 diff.y -= 2;
8924 } else if( diff.y > 0 ) {
8925 diff.y += 2;
8926 }
8927 u.mounted_creature->shove_vehicle( dest_loc + diff.xy(),
8928 dest_loc );
8929 }
8930 return false;
8931 }
8932 if( vp_there && !vp_there->vehicle().handle_potential_theft( dynamic_cast<player &>( u ) ) ) {
8933 return false;
8934 }
8935 if( u.is_mounted() && !pushing && vp_there ) {
8936 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot board a vehicle whilst riding." ) );
8937 return false;
8938 }
8939 u.set_underwater( false );
8940
8941 if( !shifting_furniture && !pushing && is_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ) ) {
8942 std::vector<std::string> harmful_stuff = get_dangerous_tile( dest_loc );
8943 if( get_option<std::string>( "DANGEROUS_TERRAIN_WARNING_PROMPT" ) == "ALWAYS" &&
8944 !prompt_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ) ) {
8945 return true;
8946 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DANGEROUS_TERRAIN_WARNING_PROMPT" ) == "RUNNING" &&
8947 ( !u.movement_mode_is( CMM_RUN ) || !prompt_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ) ) ) {
8948 add_msg( m_warning,
8949 _( "Stepping into that %1$s looks risky. Run into it if you wish to enter anyway." ),
8950 enumerate_as_string( harmful_stuff ) );
8951 return true;
8952 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DANGEROUS_TERRAIN_WARNING_PROMPT" ) == "CROUCHING" &&
8953 ( !u.movement_mode_is( CMM_CROUCH ) || !prompt_dangerous_tile( dest_loc ) ) ) {
8954 add_msg( m_warning,
8955 _( "Stepping into that %1$s looks risky. Crouch and move into it if you wish to enter anyway." ),
8956 enumerate_as_string( harmful_stuff ) );
8957 return true;
8958 } else if( get_option<std::string>( "DANGEROUS_TERRAIN_WARNING_PROMPT" ) == "NEVER" &&
8959 !u.movement_mode_is( CMM_RUN ) ) {
8960 add_msg( m_warning,
8961 _( "Stepping into that %1$s looks risky. Run into it if you wish to enter anyway." ),
8962 enumerate_as_string( harmful_stuff ) );
8963 return true;
8964 }
8965 }
8966 // Used to decide whether to print a 'moving is slow message
8967 const int mcost_from = m.move_cost( u.pos() ); //calculate this _before_ calling grabbed_move
8968
8969 int modifier = 0;
8970 if( grabbed && u.get_grab_type() == OBJECT_FURNITURE && u.pos() + u.grab_point == dest_loc ) {
8971 modifier = -m.furn( dest_loc ).obj().movecost;
8972 }
8973
8974 int multiplier = 1;
8975 if( u.is_on_ground() ) {
8976 multiplier *= 3;
8977 }
8978
8979 const int mcost = m.combined_movecost( u.pos(), dest_loc, grabbed_vehicle, modifier,
8980 via_ramp ) * multiplier;
8981 if( grabbed_move( dest_loc - u.pos() ) ) {
8982 return true;
8983 } else if( mcost == 0 ) {
8984 return false;
8985 }
8986 bool diag = trigdist && u.posx() != dest_loc.x && u.posy() != dest_loc.y;
8987 const int previous_moves = u.moves;
8988 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
8989 auto crit = u.mounted_creature.get();
8990 if( !crit->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) &&
8991 ( m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "MOUNTABLE", dest_loc ) ||
8992 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "BARRICADABLE_DOOR", dest_loc ) ||
8993 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "OPENCLOSE_INSIDE", dest_loc ) ||
8994 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "BARRICADABLE_DOOR_DAMAGED", dest_loc ) ||
8995 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "BARRICADABLE_DOOR_REINFORCED", dest_loc ) ) ) {
8996 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You cannot pass obstacles whilst mounted." ) );
8997 return false;
8998 }
8999 const double base_moves = u.run_cost( mcost, diag ) * 100.0 / crit->get_speed();
9000 const double encumb_moves = u.get_weight() / 4800.0_gram;
9001 u.moves -= static_cast<int>( std::ceil( base_moves + encumb_moves ) );
9002 if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_WALK ) ) {
9003 crit->use_mech_power( -2 );
9004 } else if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_CROUCH ) ) {
9005 crit->use_mech_power( -1 );
9006 } else if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_RUN ) ) {
9007 crit->use_mech_power( -3 );
9008 }
9009 } else {
9010 u.moves -= u.run_cost( mcost, diag );
9011 /**
9012 TODO:
9013 This should really use the mounted creatures stamina, if mounted.
9014 Monsters don't currently have stamina however.
9015 For the time being just don't burn players stamina when mounted.
9016 */
9017 if( grabbed_vehicle == nullptr || grabbed_vehicle->wheelcache.empty() ) {
9018 //Burn normal amount of stamina if no vehicle grabbed or vehicle lacks wheels
9019 u.burn_move_stamina( previous_moves - u.moves );
9020 } else {
9021 //Burn half as much stamina if vehicle has wheels, without changing move time
9022 u.burn_move_stamina( 0.50 * ( previous_moves - u.moves ) );
9023 }
9024 }
9025 // Max out recoil & reset aim point
9026 u.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
9027 u.last_target_pos = cata::nullopt;
9028
9029 // Print a message if movement is slow
9030 const int mcost_to = m.move_cost( dest_loc ); //calculate this _after_ calling grabbed_move
9031 const bool fungus = m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "FUNGUS", u.pos() ) ||
9032 m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( "FUNGUS",
9033 dest_loc ); //fungal furniture has no slowing effect on mycus characters
9034 const bool slowed = ( ( !u.has_trait( trait_PARKOUR ) && ( mcost_to > 2 || mcost_from > 2 ) ) ||
9035 mcost_to > 4 || mcost_from > 4 ) &&
9036 !( u.has_trait( trait_M_IMMUNE ) && fungus );
9037 if( slowed && !u.is_mounted() ) {
9038 // Unless u.pos() has a higher movecost than dest_loc, state that dest_loc is the cause
9039 if( mcost_to >= mcost_from ) {
9040 if( auto displayed_part = vp_there.part_displayed() ) {
9041 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Moving onto this %s is slow!" ),
9042 displayed_part->part().name() );
9043 sfx::do_obstacle( displayed_part->part().info().get_id().str() );
9044 } else {
9045 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Moving onto this %s is slow!" ), m.name( dest_loc ) );
9046 sfx::do_obstacle( m.ter( dest_loc ).id().str() );
9047 }
9048 } else {
9049 if( auto displayed_part = vp_here.part_displayed() ) {
9050 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Moving off of this %s is slow!" ),
9051 displayed_part->part().name() );
9052 sfx::do_obstacle( displayed_part->part().info().get_id().str() );
9053 } else {
9054 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Moving off of this %s is slow!" ), m.name( u.pos() ) );
9055 sfx::do_obstacle( m.ter( u.pos() ).id().str() );
9056 }
9057 }
9058 }
9059 if( !u.is_mounted() && u.has_trait( trait_id( "LEG_TENT_BRACE" ) ) &&
9060 ( !u.footwear_factor() ||
9061 ( u.footwear_factor() == .5 && one_in( 2 ) ) ) ) {
9062 // DX and IN are long suits for Cephalopods,
9063 // so this shouldn't cause too much hardship
9064 // Presumed that if it's swimmable, they're
9065 // swimming and won't stick
9066 ///\EFFECT_DEX decreases chance of tentacles getting stuck to the ground
9067
9068 ///\EFFECT_INT decreases chance of tentacles getting stuck to the ground
9069 if( !m.has_flag( "SWIMMABLE", dest_loc ) && one_in( 80 + u.dex_cur + u.int_cur ) ) {
9070 add_msg( _( "Your tentacles stick to the ground, but you pull them free." ) );
9071 u.mod_fatigue( 1 );
9072 }
9073 }
9074 if( !u.has_artifact_with( AEP_STEALTH ) && !u.has_trait( trait_id( "DEBUG_SILENT" ) ) ) {
9075 int volume = u.is_stealthy() ? 3 : 6;
9076 volume *= u.mutation_value( "noise_modifier" );
9077 if( volume > 0 ) {
9078 if( u.is_wearing( itype_rm13_armor_on ) ) {
9079 volume = 2;
9080 } else if( u.has_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_ankles" ) ) ) {
9081 volume = 12;
9082 }
9083 if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_RUN ) ) {
9084 volume *= 1.5;
9085 } else if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_CROUCH ) ) {
9086 volume /= 2;
9087 }
9088 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
9089 auto mons = u.mounted_creature.get();
9090 switch( mons->get_size() ) {
9091 case MS_TINY:
9092 volume = 0; // No sound for the tinies
9093 break;
9094 case MS_SMALL:
9095 volume /= 3;
9096 break;
9097 case MS_MEDIUM:
9098 break;
9099 case MS_LARGE:
9100 volume *= 1.5;
9101 break;
9102 case MS_HUGE:
9103 volume *= 2;
9104 break;
9105 default:
9106 break;
9107 }
9108 if( mons->has_flag( MF_LOUDMOVES ) ) {
9109 volume += 6;
9110 }
9111 sounds::sound( dest_loc, volume, sounds::sound_t::movement, mons->type->get_footsteps(), false,
9112 "none", "none" );
9113 } else {
9114 sounds::sound( dest_loc, volume, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "footsteps" ), true,
9115 "none", "none" ); // Sound of footsteps may awaken nearby monsters
9116 }
9117 sfx::do_footstep();
9118 }
9119
9120 if( one_in( 20 ) && u.has_artifact_with( AEP_MOVEMENT_NOISE ) ) {
9121 sounds::sound( u.pos(), 40, sounds::sound_t::movement, _( "a rattling sound." ), true,
9122 "misc", "rattling" );
9123 }
9124 }
9125
9126 if( m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( TFLAG_HIDE_PLACE, dest_loc ) ) {
9127 add_msg( m_good, _( "You are hiding in the %s." ), m.name( dest_loc ) );
9128 }
9129
9130 if( dest_loc != u.pos() ) {
9131 cata_event_dispatch::avatar_moves( u, m, dest_loc );
9132 }
9133
9134 tripoint oldpos = u.pos();
9135 point submap_shift = place_player( dest_loc );
9136 point ms_shift = sm_to_ms_copy( submap_shift );
9137 oldpos = oldpos - ms_shift;
9138
9139 if( pulling ) {
9140 const tripoint shifted_furn_pos = furn_pos - ms_shift;
9141 const tripoint shifted_furn_dest = furn_dest - ms_shift;
9142 const time_duration fire_age = m.get_field_age( shifted_furn_pos, fd_fire );
9143 const int fire_intensity = m.get_field_intensity( shifted_furn_pos, fd_fire );
9144 m.remove_field( shifted_furn_pos, fd_fire );
9145 m.set_field_intensity( shifted_furn_dest, fd_fire, fire_intensity );
9146 m.set_field_age( shifted_furn_dest, fd_fire, fire_age );
9147 }
9148
9149 if( u.is_hauling() ) {
9150 start_hauling( oldpos );
9151 }
9152
9153 on_move_effects();
9154
9155 return true;
9156}
9157
9158point game::place_player( const tripoint &dest_loc )
9159{
9160 const optional_vpart_position vp1 = m.veh_at( dest_loc );
9161 if( const cata::optional<std::string> label = vp1.get_label() ) {
9162 add_msg( m_info, _( "Label here: %s" ), *label );
9163 }
9164 std::string signage = m.get_signage( dest_loc );
9165 if( !signage.empty() ) {
9166 if( !u.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
9167 add_msg( m_info, _( "The sign says: %s" ), signage );
9168 } else {
9169 add_msg( m_info, _( "There is a sign here, but you are unable to read it." ) );
9170 }
9171 }
9172 if( m.has_graffiti_at( dest_loc ) ) {
9173 if( !u.has_trait( trait_ILLITERATE ) ) {
9174 add_msg( m_info, _( "Written here: %s" ), m.graffiti_at( dest_loc ) );
9175 } else {
9176 add_msg( m_info, _( "Something is written here, but you are unable to read it." ) );
9177 }
9178 }
9179 // TODO: Move the stuff below to a Character method so that NPCs can reuse it
9180 if( m.has_flag( "ROUGH", dest_loc ) && ( !u.in_vehicle ) && ( !u.is_mounted() ) ) {
9181 if( one_in( 5 ) && u.get_armor_bash( bodypart_id( "foot_l" ) ) < rng( 2, 5 ) ) {
9182 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You hurt your left foot on the %s!" ),
9183 m.has_flag_ter( "ROUGH", dest_loc ) ? m.tername( dest_loc ) : m.furnname(
9184 dest_loc ) );
9185 u.deal_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "foot_l" ), damage_instance( DT_CUT, 1 ) );
9186 }
9187 if( one_in( 5 ) && u.get_armor_bash( bodypart_id( "foot_r" ) ) < rng( 2, 5 ) ) {
9188 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You hurt your right foot on the %s!" ),
9189 m.has_flag_ter( "ROUGH", dest_loc ) ? m.tername( dest_loc ) : m.furnname(
9190 dest_loc ) );
9191 u.deal_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "foot_l" ), damage_instance( DT_CUT, 1 ) );
9192 }
9193 }
9194 ///\EFFECT_DEX increases chance of avoiding cuts on sharp terrain
9195 if( m.has_flag( "SHARP", dest_loc ) && !one_in( 3 ) && !x_in_y( 1 + u.dex_cur / 2.0, 40 ) &&
9196 ( !u.in_vehicle && !m.veh_at( dest_loc ) ) && ( !u.has_trait( trait_PARKOUR ) ||
9197 one_in( 4 ) ) && ( u.has_trait( trait_THICKSKIN ) ? !one_in( 8 ) : true ) ) {
9198 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
9199 add_msg( _( "Your %s gets cut!" ), u.mounted_creature->get_name() );
9200 u.mounted_creature->apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), rng( 1, 10 ) );
9201 } else {
9202 const bodypart_id bp = u.get_random_body_part();
9203 if( u.deal_damage( nullptr, bp, damage_instance( DT_CUT, rng( 1, 10 ) ) ).total_damage() > 0 ) {
9204 //~ 1$s - bodypart name in accusative, 2$s is terrain name.
9205 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You cut your %1$s on the %2$s!" ),
9206 body_part_name_accusative( bp->token ),
9207 m.has_flag_ter( "SHARP", dest_loc ) ? m.tername( dest_loc ) : m.furnname(
9208 dest_loc ) );
9209 }
9210 }
9211 }
9212 if( m.has_flag( "UNSTABLE", dest_loc ) && !u.is_mounted() ) {
9213 u.add_effect( effect_bouldering, 1_turns, num_bp );
9214 } else if( u.has_effect( effect_bouldering ) ) {
9215 u.remove_effect( effect_bouldering );
9216 }
9217 if( m.has_flag_ter_or_furn( TFLAG_NO_SIGHT, dest_loc ) ) {
9218 u.add_effect( effect_no_sight, 1_turns, num_bp );
9219 } else if( u.has_effect( effect_no_sight ) ) {
9220 u.remove_effect( effect_no_sight );
9221 }
9222
9223 // If we moved out of the nonant, we need update our map data
9224 if( m.has_flag( "SWIMMABLE", dest_loc ) && u.has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
9225 add_msg( _( "The water puts out the flames!" ) );
9226 u.remove_effect( effect_onfire );
9227 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
9228 monster *mon = u.mounted_creature.get();
9229 if( mon->has_effect( effect_onfire ) ) {
9230 mon->remove_effect( effect_onfire );
9231 }
9232 }
9233 }
9234
9235 if( monster *const mon_ptr = critter_at<monster>( dest_loc ) ) {
9236 // We displaced a monster. It's probably a bug if it wasn't a friendly mon...
9237 // Immobile monsters can't be displaced.
9238 monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
9239 // TODO: handling for ridden creatures other than players mount.
9240 if( !critter.has_effect( effect_ridden ) ) {
9241 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
9242 std::vector<tripoint> valid;
9243 for( const tripoint &jk : m.points_in_radius( critter.pos(), 1 ) ) {
9244 if( is_empty( jk ) ) {
9245 valid.push_back( jk );
9246 }
9247 }
9248 if( !valid.empty() ) {
9249 critter.move_to( random_entry( valid ) );
9250 add_msg( _( "You push the %s out of the way." ), critter.name() );
9251 } else {
9252 add_msg( _( "There is no room to push the %s out of the way." ), critter.name() );
9253 return u.pos().xy();
9254 }
9255 } else {
9256 critter.move_to( u.pos(), false,
9257 true ); // Force the movement even though the player is there right now.
9258 add_msg( _( "You displace the %s." ), critter.name() );
9259 }
9260 } else if( !u.has_effect( effect_riding ) ) {
9261 add_msg( _( "You cannot move the %s out of the way." ), critter.name() );
9262 return u.pos().xy();
9263 }
9264 }
9265
9266 // If the player is in a vehicle, unboard them from the current part
9267 if( u.in_vehicle ) {
9268 m.unboard_vehicle( u.pos() );
9269 }
9270 // Move the player
9271 // Start with z-level, to make it less likely that old functions (2D ones) freak out
9272 if( m.has_zlevels() && dest_loc.z != get_levz() ) {
9273 vertical_shift( dest_loc.z );
9274 }
9275
9276 if( u.is_hauling() && ( !m.can_put_items( dest_loc ) ||
9277 m.has_flag( TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, dest_loc ) ||
9278 vp1 ) ) {
9279 u.stop_hauling();
9280 }
9281 u.setpos( dest_loc );
9282 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
9283 monster *mon = u.mounted_creature.get();
9284 mon->setpos( dest_loc );
9285 mon->process_triggers();
9286 m.creature_in_field( *mon );
9287 }
9288 point submap_shift = update_map( u );
9289 // Important: don't use dest_loc after this line. `update_map` may have shifted the map
9290 // and dest_loc was not adjusted and therefore is still in the un-shifted system and probably wrong.
9291 // If you must use it you can calculate the position in the new, shifted system with
9292 // adjusted_pos = ( old_pos.x - submap_shift.x * SEEX, old_pos.y - submap_shift.y * SEEY, old_pos.z )
9293
9294 //Auto pulp or butcher and Auto foraging
9295 if( get_option<bool>( "AUTO_FEATURES" ) && mostseen == 0 && !u.is_mounted() ) {
9296 static const direction adjacentDir[8] = { direction::NORTH, direction::NORTHEAST, direction::EAST, direction::SOUTHEAST, direction::SOUTH, direction::SOUTHWEST, direction::WEST, direction::NORTHWEST };
9297
9298 const std::string forage_type = get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_FORAGING" );
9299 if( forage_type != "off" ) {
9300 const auto forage = [&]( const tripoint & pos ) {
9301 const auto &xter_t = m.ter( pos ).obj().examine;
9302 const auto &xfurn_t = m.furn( pos ).obj().examine;
9303 const bool forage_everything = forage_type == "both";
9304 const bool forage_bushes = forage_everything || forage_type == "bushes";
9305 const bool forage_trees = forage_everything || forage_type == "trees";
9306 if( xter_t == &iexamine::none ) {
9307 return;
9308 } else if( ( forage_bushes && xter_t == &iexamine::shrub_marloss ) ||
9309 ( forage_bushes && xter_t == &iexamine::shrub_wildveggies ) ||
9310 ( forage_bushes && xter_t == &iexamine::harvest_ter_nectar ) ||
9311 ( forage_trees && xter_t == &iexamine::tree_marloss ) ||
9312 ( forage_trees && xter_t == &iexamine::harvest_ter ) ||
9313 ( forage_trees && xter_t == &iexamine::harvest_ter_nectar )
9314 ) {
9315 xter_t( u, pos );
9316 } else if( ( forage_everything && xfurn_t == &iexamine::harvest_furn ) ||
9317 ( forage_everything && xfurn_t == &iexamine::harvest_furn_nectar )
9318 ) {
9319 xfurn_t( u, pos );
9320 }
9321 };
9322
9323 for( auto &elem : adjacentDir ) {
9324 forage( u.pos() + direction_XY( elem ) );
9325 }
9326 }
9327
9328 const std::string pulp_butcher = get_option<std::string>( "AUTO_PULP_BUTCHER" );
9329 if( pulp_butcher == "butcher" && u.max_quality( quality_id( "BUTCHER" ) ) > INT_MIN ) {
9330 std::vector<item *> corpses;
9331
9332 for( item &it : m.i_at( u.pos() ) ) {
9333 corpses.push_back( &it );
9334 }
9335
9336 if( !corpses.empty() ) {
9337 u.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_BUTCHER" ), 0, true );
9338 for( item *it : corpses ) {
9339 u.activity.targets.emplace_back( map_cursor( u.pos() ), it );
9340 }
9341 }
9342 } else if( pulp_butcher == "pulp" || pulp_butcher == "pulp_adjacent" ) {
9343 const auto pulp = [&]( const tripoint & pos ) {
9344 for( const auto &maybe_corpse : m.i_at( pos ) ) {
9345 if( maybe_corpse.is_corpse() && maybe_corpse.can_revive() &&
9346 !maybe_corpse.get_mtype()->bloodType().obj().has_acid ) {
9347 u.assign_activity( activity_id( "ACT_PULP" ), calendar::INDEFINITELY_LONG, 0 );
9348 u.activity.placement = m.getabs( pos );
9349 u.activity.auto_resume = true;
9350 u.activity.str_values.push_back( "auto_pulp_no_acid" );
9351 return;
9352 }
9353 }
9354 };
9355
9356 if( pulp_butcher == "pulp_adjacent" ) {
9357 for( auto &elem : adjacentDir ) {
9358 pulp( u.pos() + direction_XY( elem ) );
9359 }
9360 } else {
9361 pulp( u.pos() );
9362 }
9363 }
9364 }
9365
9366 //Autopickup
9367 if( !u.is_mounted() && get_option<bool>( "AUTO_PICKUP" ) && !u.is_hauling() &&
9368 ( !get_option<bool>( "AUTO_PICKUP_SAFEMODE" ) || mostseen == 0 ) &&
9369 ( m.has_items( u.pos() ) || get_option<bool>( "AUTO_PICKUP_ADJACENT" ) ) ) {
9370 pickup::pick_up( u.pos(), -1 );
9371 }
9372
9373 // If the new tile is a boardable part, board it
9374 if( vp1.part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true ) && !u.is_mounted() ) {
9375 m.board_vehicle( u.pos(), &u );
9376 }
9377
9378 // Traps!
9379 // Try to detect.
9380 u.search_surroundings();
9381 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
9382 m.creature_on_trap( *u.mounted_creature );
9383 } else {
9384 m.creature_on_trap( u );
9385 }
9386 // Drench the player if swimmable
9387 if( m.has_flag( "SWIMMABLE", u.pos() ) &&
9388 !( u.is_mounted() || ( u.in_vehicle && vp1->vehicle().can_float() ) ) ) {
9389 u.drench( 40, { { bp_foot_l, bp_foot_r, bp_leg_l, bp_leg_r } }, false );
9390 }
9391
9392 // List items here
9393 if( !m.has_flag( "SEALED", u.pos() ) ) {
9394 if( get_option<bool>( "NO_AUTO_PICKUP_ZONES_LIST_ITEMS" ) ||
9395 !check_zone( zone_type_id( "NO_AUTO_PICKUP" ), u.pos() ) ) {
9396 if( u.is_blind() && !m.i_at( u.pos() ).empty() ) {
9397 add_msg( _( "There's something here, but you can't see what it is." ) );
9398 } else if( m.has_items( u.pos() ) ) {
9399 std::vector<std::string> names;
9400 std::vector<size_t> counts;
9401 std::vector<item> items;
9402 for( auto &tmpitem : m.i_at( u.pos() ) ) {
9403
9404 std::string next_tname = tmpitem.tname();
9405 std::string next_dname = tmpitem.display_name();
9406 bool by_charges = tmpitem.count_by_charges();
9407 bool got_it = false;
9408 for( size_t i = 0; i < names.size(); ++i ) {
9409 if( by_charges && next_tname == names[i] ) {
9410 counts[i] += tmpitem.charges;
9411 got_it = true;
9412 break;
9413 } else if( next_dname == names[i] ) {
9414 counts[i] += 1;
9415 got_it = true;
9416 break;
9417 }
9418 }
9419 if( !got_it ) {
9420 if( by_charges ) {
9421 names.push_back( tmpitem.tname( tmpitem.charges ) );
9422 counts.push_back( tmpitem.charges );
9423 } else {
9424 names.push_back( tmpitem.display_name( 1 ) );
9425 counts.push_back( 1 );
9426 }
9427 items.push_back( tmpitem );
9428 }
9429 if( names.size() > 10 ) {
9430 break;
9431 }
9432 }
9433 for( size_t i = 0; i < names.size(); ++i ) {
9434 if( !items[i].count_by_charges() ) {
9435 names[i] = items[i].display_name( counts[i] );
9436 } else {
9437 names[i] = items[i].tname( counts[i] );
9438 }
9439 }
9440 int and_the_rest = 0;
9441 for( size_t i = 0; i < names.size(); ++i ) {
9442 //~ number of items: "<number> <item>"
9443 std::string fmt = vgettext( "%1$d %2$s", "%1$d %2$s", counts[i] );
9444 names[i] = string_format( fmt, counts[i], names[i] );
9445 // Skip the first two.
9446 if( i > 1 ) {
9447 and_the_rest += counts[i];
9448 }
9449 }
9450 if( names.size() == 1 ) {
9451 add_msg( _( "You see here %s." ), names[0] );
9452 } else if( names.size() == 2 ) {
9453 add_msg( _( "You see here %s and %s." ), names[0], names[1] );
9454 } else if( names.size() == 3 ) {
9455 add_msg( _( "You see here %s, %s, and %s." ), names[0], names[1], names[2] );
9456 } else if( and_the_rest < 7 ) {
9457 add_msg( vgettext( "You see here %s, %s and %d more item.",
9458 "You see here %s, %s and %d more items.",
9459 and_the_rest ),
9460 names[0], names[1], and_the_rest );
9461 } else {
9462 add_msg( _( "You see here %s and many more items." ), names[0] );
9463 }
9464 }
9465 }
9466 }
9467
9468 if( ( vp1.part_with_feature( "CONTROL_ANIMAL", true ) ||
9469 vp1.part_with_feature( "CONTROLS", true ) ) && u.in_vehicle && !u.is_mounted() ) {
9470 add_msg( _( "There are vehicle controls here." ) );
9471 if( !u.has_trait( trait_id( "WAYFARER" ) ) ) {
9472 add_msg( m_info, _( "%s to drive." ), press_x( ACTION_CONTROL_VEHICLE ) );
9473 }
9474 } else if( vp1.part_with_feature( "CONTROLS", true ) && u.in_vehicle &&
9475 u.is_mounted() ) {
9476 add_msg( _( "There are vehicle controls here but you cannot reach them whilst mounted." ) );
9477 }
9478 return submap_shift;
9479}
9480
9481void game::place_player_overmap( const tripoint_abs_omt &om_dest )
9482{
9483 // if player is teleporting around, they don't bring their horse with them
9484 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
9485 u.remove_effect( effect_riding );
9486 u.mounted_creature->remove_effect( effect_ridden );
9487 u.mounted_creature = nullptr;
9488 }
9489 // offload the active npcs.
9490 unload_npcs();
9491 for( monster &critter : all_monsters() ) {
9492 despawn_monster( critter );
9493 }
9494 if( u.in_vehicle ) {
9495 m.unboard_vehicle( u.pos() );
9496 }
9497
9498 m.clear_vehicle_cache( );
9499 const int minz = m.has_zlevels() ? -OVERMAP_DEPTH : get_levz();
9500 const int maxz = m.has_zlevels() ? OVERMAP_HEIGHT : get_levz();
9501 for( int z = minz; z <= maxz; z++ ) {
9502 m.clear_vehicle_list( z );
9503 }
9504 m.access_cache( get_levz() ).map_memory_seen_cache.reset();
9505 // offset because load_map expects the coordinates of the top left corner, but the
9506 // player will be centered in the middle of the map.
9507 // TODO: fix point types
9508 const tripoint map_sm_pos(
9509 project_to<coords::sm>( om_dest ).raw() + point( -HALF_MAPSIZE, -HALF_MAPSIZE ) );
9510 const tripoint player_pos( u.pos().xy(), map_sm_pos.z );
9511 load_map( map_sm_pos );
9512 load_npcs();
9513 m.spawn_monsters( true ); // Static monsters
9514 update_overmap_seen();
9515 // update weather now as it could be different on the new location
9516 get_weather().nextweather = calendar::turn;
9517 place_player( player_pos );
9518}
9519
9520bool game::phasing_move( const tripoint &dest_loc, const bool via_ramp )
9521{
9522 if( dest_loc.z != u.posz() && !via_ramp ) {
9523 // No vertical phasing yet
9524 return false;
9525 }
9526
9527 //probability travel through walls but not water
9528 tripoint dest = dest_loc;
9529 // tile is impassable
9530 int tunneldist = 0;
9531 const point d( sgn( dest.x - u.posx() ), sgn( dest.y - u.posy() ) );
9532 while( m.impassable( dest ) ||
9533 ( critter_at( dest ) != nullptr && tunneldist > 0 ) ) {
9534 //add 1 to tunnel distance for each impassable tile in the line
9535 tunneldist += 1;
9536 //Being dimensionally anchored prevents quantum shenanigans.
9537 if( u.worn_with_flag( "DIMENSIONAL_ANCHOR" ) || u.has_effect_with_flag( "DIMENSIONAL_ANCHOR" ) ) {
9538 u.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
9539 _( "You try to quantum tunnel through the barrier, but something holds you back!" ) );
9540 return false;
9541 }
9542
9543 if( tunneldist > 24 ) {
9544 add_msg( m_info, _( "It's too dangerous to tunnel that far!" ) );
9545 return false;
9546 }
9547
9548 dest.x += d.x;
9549 dest.y += d.y;
9550 }
9551
9552 if( tunneldist != 0 ) {
9553 if( ( tunneldist - 1 ) * 100_kJ
9554 > //The first 100 was already taken up by the bionic's activation cost.
9555 u.get_power_level() ) { //oops, not enough energy! Tunneling costs 100 bionic power per impassable tile
9556 if( tunneldist * 100_kJ >
9557 u.get_max_power_level() ) {
9558 add_msg( _( "You try to quantum tunnel through the barrier but bounce off! You don't have enough bionic power capacity to travel that far." ) );
9559 } else {
9560 add_msg( _( "You try to quantum tunnel through the barrier but are reflected! You need %i bionic power to travel that thickness of material." ),
9561 ( 100 * tunneldist ) );
9562 }
9563 return false;
9564 }
9565
9566 if( u.in_vehicle ) {
9567 m.unboard_vehicle( u.pos() );
9568 }
9569
9570 add_msg( _( "You quantum tunnel through the %d-tile wide barrier!" ), tunneldist );
9571 //tunneling costs 100 bionic power per impassable tile, but the first 100 was already drained by activation.
9572 u.mod_power_level( -( ( tunneldist - 1 ) * 100_kJ ) );
9573 //tunneling costs 100 moves baseline, 50 per extra tile up to a cap of 500 moves
9574 u.moves -= ( 50 + ( tunneldist * 50 ) );
9575 u.setpos( dest );
9576
9577 if( m.veh_at( u.pos() ).part_with_feature( "BOARDABLE", true ) ) {
9578 m.board_vehicle( u.pos(), &u );
9579 }
9580
9581 u.grab( OBJECT_NONE );
9582 on_move_effects();
9583 m.creature_on_trap( u );
9584 return true;
9585 }
9586
9587 return false;
9588}
9589
9590bool game::grabbed_furn_move( const tripoint &dp )
9591{
9592 // Furniture: pull, push, or standing still and nudging object around.
9593 // Can push furniture out of reach.
9594 tripoint fpos = u.pos() + u.grab_point;
9595 // supposed position of grabbed furniture
9596 if( !m.has_furn( fpos ) ) {
9597 // Where did it go? We're grabbing thin air so reset.
9598 add_msg( m_info, _( "No furniture at grabbed point." ) );
9599 u.grab( OBJECT_NONE );
9600 return false;
9601 }
9602
9603 const bool pushing_furniture = dp == u.grab_point;
9604 const bool pulling_furniture = dp == -u.grab_point;
9605 const bool shifting_furniture = !pushing_furniture && !pulling_furniture;
9606
9607 tripoint fdest = fpos + dp; // intended destination of furniture.
9608 // Check floor: floorless tiles don't need to be flat and have no traps
9609 const bool has_floor = m.has_floor( fdest );
9610 // Unfortunately, game::is_empty fails for tiles we're standing on,
9611 // which will forbid pulling, so:
9612 const bool canmove = (
9613 m.passable( fdest ) &&
9614 critter_at<npc>( fdest ) == nullptr &&
9615 critter_at<monster>( fdest ) == nullptr &&
9616 ( !pulling_furniture || is_empty( u.pos() + dp ) ) &&
9617 ( !has_floor || m.has_flag( "FLAT", fdest ) ) &&
9618 !m.has_furn( fdest ) &&
9619 !m.veh_at( fdest ) &&
9620 ( !has_floor || m.tr_at( fdest ).is_null() )
9621 );
9622
9623 const furn_t furntype = m.furn( fpos ).obj();
9624 const int src_items = m.i_at( fpos ).size();
9625 const int dst_items = m.i_at( fdest ).size();
9626
9627 const bool only_liquid_items = std::all_of( m.i_at( fdest ).begin(), m.i_at( fdest ).end(),
9628 [&]( item & liquid_item ) {
9629 return liquid_item.made_of( LIQUID );
9630 } );
9631
9632 const bool dst_item_ok = !m.has_flag( "NOITEM", fdest ) &&
9633 !m.has_flag( "SWIMMABLE", fdest ) &&
9634 !m.has_flag( "DESTROY_ITEM", fdest );
9635
9636 const bool src_item_ok = m.furn( fpos ).obj().has_flag( "CONTAINER" ) ||
9637 m.furn( fpos ).obj().has_flag( "FIRE_CONTAINER" ) ||
