9638 m.furn( fpos ).obj().has_flag( "SEALED" );
9639
9640 const int fire_intensity = m.get_field_intensity( fpos, fd_fire );
9641 time_duration fire_age = m.get_field_age( fpos, fd_fire );
9642
9643 int str_req = furntype.move_str_req;
9644 // Factor in weight of items contained in the furniture.
9645 units::mass furniture_contents_weight = 0_gram;
9646 for( auto &contained_item : m.i_at( fpos ) ) {
9647 furniture_contents_weight += contained_item.weight();
9648 }
9649 str_req += furniture_contents_weight / 4_kilogram;
9650 if( !canmove ) {
9651 // TODO: What is something?
9652 add_msg( _( "The %s collides with something." ), furntype.name() );
9653 u.moves -= 50;
9654 return true;
9655 ///\EFFECT_STR determines ability to drag furniture
9656 } else if( str_req > u.get_str() &&
9657 one_in( std::max( 20 - str_req - u.get_str(), 2 ) ) ) {
9658 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You strain yourself trying to move the heavy %s!" ),
9659 furntype.name() );
9660 u.moves -= 100;
9661 u.mod_pain( 1 ); // Hurt ourselves.
9662 return true; // furniture and or obstacle wins.
9663 } else if( !src_item_ok && !only_liquid_items && dst_items > 0 ) {
9664 add_msg( _( "There's stuff in the way." ) );
9665 u.moves -= 50;
9666 return true;
9667 }
9668
9669 u.moves -= str_req * 10;
9670 // Additional penalty if we can't comfortably move it.
9671 if( str_req > u.get_str() ) {
9672 int move_penalty = std::pow( str_req, 2.0 ) + 100.0;
9673 if( move_penalty <= 1000 ) {
9674 if( u.get_str() >= str_req - 3 ) {
9675 u.moves -= std::max( 3000, move_penalty * 10 );
9676 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The %s is really heavy!" ), furntype.name() );
9677 if( one_in( 3 ) ) {
9678 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You fail to move the %s." ), furntype.name() );
9679 return true;
9680 }
9681 } else {
9682 u.moves -= 100;
9683 add_msg( m_bad, _( "The %s is too heavy for you to budge." ), furntype.name() );
9684 return true;
9685 }
9686 }
9687 u.moves -= move_penalty;
9688 if( move_penalty > 500 ) {
9689 add_msg( _( "Moving the heavy %s is taking a lot of time!" ),
9690 furntype.name() );
9691 } else if( move_penalty > 200 ) {
9692 if( one_in( 3 ) ) { // Nag only occasionally.
9693 add_msg( _( "It takes some time to move the heavy %s." ),
9694 furntype.name() );
9695 }
9696 }
9697 }
9698 sounds::sound( fdest, furntype.move_str_req * 2, sounds::sound_t::movement,
9699 _( "a scraping noise." ), true, "misc", "scraping" );
9700
9701 active_tile_data *atd = active_tiles::furn_at<active_tile_data>
9702 ( tripoint_abs_ms( m.getabs( fpos ) ) );
9703
9704 // Actually move the furniture.
9705 m.furn_set( fdest, m.furn( fpos ), atd ? atd->clone() : nullptr );
9706 m.furn_set( fpos, f_null );
9707
9708 if( fire_intensity == 1 && !pulling_furniture ) {
9709 m.remove_field( fpos, fd_fire );
9710 m.set_field_intensity( fdest, fd_fire, fire_intensity );
9711 m.set_field_age( fdest, fd_fire, fire_age );
9712 }
9713
9714 // Is there is only liquids on the ground, remove them after moving furniture.
9715 if( dst_items > 0 && only_liquid_items ) {
9716 m.i_clear( fdest );
9717 }
9718
9719 if( src_items > 0 ) { // Move the stuff inside.
9720 if( dst_item_ok && src_item_ok ) {
9721 // Assume contents of both cells are legal, so we can just swap contents.
9722 std::list<item> temp;
9723 std::move( m.i_at( fpos ).begin(), m.i_at( fpos ).end(),
9724 std::back_inserter( temp ) );
9725 m.i_clear( fpos );
9726 for( auto item_iter = m.i_at( fdest ).begin();
9727 item_iter != m.i_at( fdest ).end(); ++item_iter ) {
9728 m.i_at( fpos ).insert( *item_iter );
9729 }
9730 m.i_clear( fdest );
9731 for( auto &cur_item : temp ) {
9732 m.i_at( fdest ).insert( cur_item );
9733 }
9734 } else {
9735 add_msg( _( "Stuff spills from the %s!" ), furntype.name() );
9736 }
9737 }
9738
9739 if( shifting_furniture ) {
9740 // We didn't move
9741 tripoint d_sum = u.grab_point + dp;
9742 if( std::abs( d_sum.x ) < 2 && std::abs( d_sum.y ) < 2 ) {
9743 u.grab_point = d_sum; // furniture moved relative to us
9744 } else { // we pushed furniture out of reach
9745 add_msg( _( "You let go of the %s." ), furntype.name() );
9746 u.grab( OBJECT_NONE );
9747 }
9748 return true; // We moved furniture but stayed still.
9749 }
9750
9751 if( pushing_furniture && m.impassable( fpos ) ) {
9752 // Not sure how that chair got into a wall, but don't let player follow.
9753 add_msg( _( "You let go of the %1$s as it slides past %2$s." ),
9754 furntype.name(), m.tername( fdest ) );
9755 u.grab( OBJECT_NONE );
9756 return true;
9757 }
9758
9759 return false;
9760}
9761
9762bool game::grabbed_move( const tripoint &dp )
9763{
9764 if( u.get_grab_type() == OBJECT_NONE ) {
9765 return false;
9766 }
9767
9768 if( dp.z != 0 ) {
9769 // No dragging stuff up/down stairs yet!
9770 return false;
9771 }
9772
9773 // vehicle: pulling, pushing, or moving around the grabbed object.
9774 if( u.get_grab_type() == OBJECT_VEHICLE ) {
9775 return grabbed_veh_move( dp );
9776 }
9777
9778 if( u.get_grab_type() == OBJECT_FURNITURE ) {
9779 return grabbed_furn_move( dp );
9780 }
9781
9782 add_msg( m_info, _( "Nothing at grabbed point %d,%d,%d or bad grabbed object type." ),
9783 u.grab_point.x, u.grab_point.y, u.grab_point.z );
9784 u.grab( OBJECT_NONE );
9785 return false;
9786}
9787
9788void game::on_move_effects()
9789{
9790 // TODO: Move this to a character method
9791 if( !u.is_mounted() ) {
9792 const item muscle( "muscle" );
9793 for( const bionic_id &bid : u.get_bionic_fueled_with( muscle ) ) {
9794 if( u.has_active_bionic( bid ) ) {// active power gen
9795 u.mod_power_level( units::from_kilojoule( muscle.fuel_energy() ) * bid->fuel_efficiency );
9796 } else if( u.has_bionic( bid ) ) {// passive power gen
9797 u.mod_power_level( units::from_kilojoule( muscle.fuel_energy() ) * bid->passive_fuel_efficiency );
9798 }
9799 }
9800
9801 if( u.has_active_bionic( bionic_id( "bio_jointservo" ) ) ) {
9802 if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_RUN ) ) {
9803 u.mod_power_level( -55_J );
9804 } else {
9805 u.mod_power_level( -35_J );
9806 }
9807 }
9808 }
9809
9810 if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_RUN ) ) {
9811 if( !u.can_run() ) {
9812 u.toggle_run_mode();
9813 }
9814 }
9815
9816 // apply martial art move bonuses
9817 u.martial_arts_data->ma_onmove_effects( u );
9818
9819 sfx::do_ambient();
9820}
9821
9822void game::on_options_changed()
9823{
9824#if defined(TILES)
9825 tilecontext->on_options_changed();
9826#endif
9827 grid_tracker_ptr->on_options_changed();
9828}
9829
9830void game::fling_creature( Creature *c, const units::angle &dir, float flvel, bool controlled,
9831 bool suppress_map_update )
9832{
9833 if( c == nullptr ) {
9834 debugmsg( "game::fling_creature invoked on null target" );
9835 return;
9836 }
9837
9838 if( c->is_dead_state() ) {
9839 // Flinging a corpse causes problems, don't enable without testing
9840 return;
9841 }
9842
9843 if( c->is_hallucination() ) {
9844 // Don't fling hallucinations
9845 return;
9846 }
9847
9848 bool thru = true;
9849 const bool is_u = ( c == &u );
9850 // Don't animate critters getting bashed if animations are off
9851 const bool animate = is_u || get_option<bool>( "ANIMATIONS" );
9852
9853 player *p = dynamic_cast<player *>( c );
9854
9855 tileray tdir( dir );
9856 int range = flvel / 10;
9857 tripoint pt = c->pos();
9858 tripoint prev_point = pt;
9859 bool force_next = false;
9860 tripoint next_forced;
9861 while( range > 0 ) {
9862 c->underwater = false;
9863 // TODO: Check whenever it is actually in the viewport
9864 // or maybe even just redraw the changed tiles
9865 bool seen = is_u || u.sees( *c ); // To avoid redrawing when not seen
9866 if( force_next ) {
9867 pt = next_forced;
9868 force_next = false;
9869 } else {
9870 tdir.advance();
9871 pt.x = c->posx() + tdir.dx();
9872 pt.y = c->posy() + tdir.dy();
9873 }
9874 float force = 0;
9875
9876 if( m.obstructed_by_vehicle_rotation( prev_point, pt ) ) {
9877 //We process the intervening tile on this iteration and then the current tile on the next
9878 next_forced = pt;
9879 force_next = true;
9880 if( one_in( 2 ) ) {
9881 pt.x = prev_point.x;
9882 } else {
9883 pt.y = prev_point.y;
9884 }
9885 }
9886
9887
9888 if( monster *const mon_ptr = critter_at<monster>( pt ) ) {
9889 monster &critter = *mon_ptr;
9890 // Approximate critter's "stopping power" with its max hp
9891 force = std::min<float>( 1.5f * critter.type->hp, flvel );
9892 const int damage = rng( force, force * 2.0f ) / 6;
9893 c->impact( damage, pt );
9894 // Multiply zed damage by 6 because no body parts
9895 const int zed_damage = std::max( 0,
9896 ( damage - critter.get_armor_bash( bodypart_id( "torso" ) ) ) * 6 );
9897 // TODO: Pass the "flinger" here - it's not the flung critter that deals damage
9898 critter.apply_damage( c, bodypart_id( "torso" ), zed_damage );
9899 critter.check_dead_state();
9900 if( !critter.is_dead() ) {
9901 thru = false;
9902 }
9903 } else if( m.impassable( pt ) ) {
9904 if( !m.veh_at( pt ).obstacle_at_part() ) {
9905 force = std::min<float>( m.bash_strength( pt ), flvel );
9906 } else {
9907 // No good way of limiting force here
9908 // Keep it 1 less than maximum to make the impact hurt
9909 // but to keep the target flying after it
9910 force = flvel - 1;
9911 }
9912 const int damage = rng( force, force * 2.0f ) / 9;
9913 c->impact( damage, pt );
9914 if( m.is_bashable( pt ) ) {
9915 // Only go through if we successfully make the tile passable
9916 m.bash( pt, flvel );
9917 thru = m.passable( pt );
9918 } else {
9919 thru = false;
9920 }
9921 }
9922
9923 // If the critter dies during flinging, moving it around causes debugmsgs
9924 if( c->is_dead_state() ) {
9925 return;
9926 }
9927
9928 flvel -= force;
9929 if( thru ) {
9930 if( p != nullptr ) {
9931 if( p->in_vehicle ) {
9932 m.unboard_vehicle( p->pos() );
9933 }
9934 // If we're flinging the player around, make sure the map stays centered on them.
9935 if( is_u && !suppress_map_update ) {
9936 update_map( pt.x, pt.y );
9937 } else {
9938 p->setpos( pt );
9939 }
9940 } else if( !critter_at( pt ) ) {
9941 // Dying monster doesn't always leave an empty tile (blob spawning etc.)
9942 // Just don't setpos if it happens - next iteration will do so
9943 // or the monster will stop a tile before the unpassable one
9944 c->setpos( pt );
9945 }
9946 } else {
9947 // Don't zero flvel - count this as slamming both the obstacle and the ground
9948 // although at lower velocity
9949 break;
9950 }
9951 //Vehicle wall tiles don't count for range
9952 if( !force_next ) {
9953 range--;
9954 }
9955 prev_point = pt;
9956 if( animate && ( seen || u.sees( *c ) ) ) {
9957 invalidate_main_ui_adaptor();
9958 ui_manager::redraw_invalidated();
9959 refresh_display();
9960 }
9961 }
9962
9963 // Fall down to the ground - always on the last reached tile
9964 if( !m.has_flag( "SWIMMABLE", c->pos() ) ) {
9965 const trap_id trap_under_creature = m.tr_at( c->pos() ).loadid;
9966 // Didn't smash into a wall or a floor so only take the fall damage
9967 if( thru && trap_under_creature == tr_ledge ) {
9968 m.creature_on_trap( *c, false );
9969 } else {
9970 // Fall on ground
9971 int force = rng( flvel, flvel * 2 ) / 9;
9972 if( controlled ) {
9973 force = std::max( force / 2 - 5, 0 );
9974 }
9975 if( force > 0 ) {
9976 int dmg = c->impact( force, c->pos() );
9977 // TODO: Make landing damage the floor
9978 m.bash( c->pos(), dmg / 4, false, false, false );
9979 }
9980 // Always apply traps to creature i.e. bear traps, tele traps etc.
9981 m.creature_on_trap( *c, false );
9982 }
9983 } else {
9984 c->underwater = true;
9985 if( is_u ) {
9986 if( controlled ) {
9987 add_msg( _( "You dive into water." ) );
9988 } else {
9989 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You fall into water." ) );
9990 }
9991 }
9992 }
9993}
9994
9995static cata::optional<tripoint> point_selection_menu( const std::vector<tripoint> &pts )
9996{
9997 if( pts.empty() ) {
9998 debugmsg( "point_selection_menu called with empty point set" );
9999 return cata::nullopt;
10000 }
10001
10002 if( pts.size() == 1 ) {
10003 return pts[0];
10004 }
10005
10006 const tripoint &upos = g->u.pos();
10007 uilist pmenu;
10008 pmenu.title = _( "Climb where?" );
10009 int num = 0;
10010 for( const tripoint &pt : pts ) {
10011 // TODO: Sort the menu so that it can be used with numpad directions
10012 const std::string &direction = direction_name( direction_from( upos.xy(), pt.xy() ) );
10013 // TODO: Inform player what is on said tile
10014 // But don't just print terrain name (in many cases it will be "open air")
10015 pmenu.addentry( num++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, _( "Climb %s" ), direction );
10016 }
10017
10018 pmenu.query();
10019 const int ret = pmenu.ret;
10020 if( ret < 0 || ret >= num ) {
10021 return cata::nullopt;
10022 }
10023
10024 return pts[ret];
10025}
10026
10027static cata::optional<tripoint> find_empty_spot_nearby( const tripoint &pos )
10028{
10029 map &here = get_map();
10030 for( const tripoint &p : here.points_in_radius( pos, 1 ) ) {
10031 if( p == pos ) {
10032 continue;
10033 }
10034 if( here.impassable( p ) ) {
10035 continue;
10036 }
10037 if( g->critter_at( p ) ) {
10038 continue;
10039 }
10040 return p;
10041 }
10042 return cata::nullopt;
10043}
10044
10045void game::vertical_move( int movez, bool force, bool peeking )
10046{
10047 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10048 auto mons = u.mounted_creature.get();
10049 if( mons->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
10050 if( !mons->check_mech_powered() ) {
10051 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Your %s refuses to move as its batteries have been drained." ),
10052 mons->get_name() );
10053 return;
10054 }
10055 }
10056 }
10057
10058 // > and < are used for diving underwater.
10059 if( m.has_flag( "SWIMMABLE", u.pos() ) && m.has_flag( TFLAG_DEEP_WATER, u.pos() ) ) {
10060 if( movez == -1 ) {
10061 if( u.is_underwater() ) {
10062 add_msg( m_info, _( "You are already underwater!" ) );
10063 return;
10064 }
10065 if( u.worn_with_flag( "FLOTATION" ) ) {
10066 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't dive while wearing a flotation device." ) );
10067 return;
10068 }
10069 u.set_underwater( true );
10070 ///\EFFECT_STR increases breath-holding capacity while diving
10071 u.oxygen = 30 + 2 * u.str_cur;
10072 add_msg( _( "You dive underwater!" ) );
10073 } else {
10074 if( u.swim_speed() < 500 || u.shoe_type_count( itype_swim_fins ) ) {
10075 u.set_underwater( false );
10076 add_msg( _( "You surface." ) );
10077 } else {
10078 add_msg( m_info, _( "You try to surface but can't!" ) );
10079 }
10080 }
10081 u.moves -= 100;
10082 return;
10083 }
10084
10085 // Force means we're going down, even if there's no staircase, etc.
10086 bool climbing = false;
10087 int move_cost = 100;
10088 tripoint stairs( u.posx(), u.posy(), u.posz() + movez );
10089 if( m.has_zlevels() && !force && movez == 1 && !m.has_flag( "GOES_UP", u.pos() ) ) {
10090 // Climbing
10091 if( m.has_floor_or_support( stairs ) ) {
10092 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't climb here - there's a ceiling above your head." ) );
10093 return;
10094 }
10095
10096 std::vector<tripoint> pts;
10097 for( const auto &pt : m.points_in_radius( stairs, 1 ) ) {
10098 if( m.passable( pt ) &&
10099 m.has_floor_or_support( pt ) ) {
10100 pts.push_back( pt );
10101 }
10102 }
10103
10104 const int cost = map_funcs::climbing_cost( m, u.pos(), stairs );
10105
10106 if( cost == 0 ) {
10107 if( u.has_trait( trait_WEB_ROPE ) ) {
10108 if( pts.empty() ) {
10109 add_msg( m_info, _( "There is nothing above you that you can attach a web to." ) );
10110 } else if( can_use_mutation_warn( trait_WEB_ROPE, u ) ) {
10111 if( g->m.move_cost( u.pos() ) != 2 && g->m.move_cost( u.pos() ) != 3 ) {
10112 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't spin a web rope there." ) );
10113 } else if( g->m.has_furn( u.pos() ) ) {
10114 add_msg( m_info, _( "There is already furniture at that location." ) );
10115 } else {
10116 if( query_yn( "Spin a rope and climb?" ) ) {
10117 add_msg( m_good, _( "You spin a rope of web." ) );
10118 g->m.furn_set( u.pos(), furn_str_id( "f_rope_up_web" ) );
10119 u.mod_moves( to_turns<int>( 2_seconds ) );
10120 u.mutation_spend_resources( trait_WEB_ROPE );
10121 vertical_move( movez, force, peeking );
10122 }
10123 }
10124 }
10125
10126 } else {
10127 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't climb here - you need walls and/or furniture to brace against." ) );
10128
10129 }
10130 return;
10131
10132 }
10133
10134 if( cost <= 0 || pts.empty() ) {
10135 add_msg( m_info,
10136 _( "You can't climb here - there is no terrain above you that would support your weight." ) );
10137 return;
10138 } else {
10139 // TODO: Make it an extended action
10140 climbing = true;
10141 move_cost = cost;
10142
10143 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt = point_selection_menu( pts );
10144 if( !pnt ) {
10145 return;
10146 }
10147 stairs = *pnt;
10148 }
10149 }
10150
10151 if( !force && movez == -1 && !m.has_flag( "GOES_DOWN", u.pos() ) ) {
10152 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't go down here!" ) );
10153 return;
10154 } else if( !climbing && !force && movez == 1 && !m.has_flag( "GOES_UP", u.pos() ) ) {
10155 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't go up here!" ) );
10156 return;
10157 }
10158
10159 if( force ) {
10160 // Let go of a grabbed cart.
10161 u.grab( OBJECT_NONE );
10162 } else if( u.grab_point != tripoint_zero ) {
10163 add_msg( m_info, _( "You can't drag things up and down stairs." ) );
10164 return;
10165 }
10166
10167 // Because get_levz takes z-value from the map, it will change when vertical_shift (m.has_zlevels() == true)
10168 // is called or when the map is loaded on new z-level (== false).
10169 // This caches the z-level we start the movement on (current) and the level we're want to end.
10170 const int z_before = get_levz();
10171 const int z_after = get_levz() + movez;
10172 if( z_after < -OVERMAP_DEPTH || z_after > OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
10173 debugmsg( "Tried to move outside allowed range of z-levels" );
10174 return;
10175 }
10176
10177 if( !u.move_effects( false ) ) {
10178 return;
10179 }
10180
10181 // Check if there are monsters are using the stairs.
10182 bool slippedpast = false;
10183 if( !m.has_zlevels() && !coming_to_stairs.empty() && !force ) {
10184 // TODO: Allow travel if zombie couldn't reach stairs, but spawn him when we go up.
10185 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You try to use the stairs. Suddenly you are blocked by a %s!" ),
10186 coming_to_stairs[0].name() );
10187 // Roll.
10188 ///\EFFECT_DEX increases chance of moving past monsters on stairs
10189
10190 ///\EFFECT_DODGE increases chance of moving past monsters on stairs
10191 int dexroll = dice( 6, u.dex_cur + u.get_skill_level( skill_dodge ) * 2 );
10192 ///\EFFECT_STR increases chance of moving past monsters on stairs
10193
10194 ///\EFFECT_MELEE increases chance of moving past monsters on stairs
10195 int strroll = dice( 3, u.str_cur + u.get_skill_level( skill_melee ) * 1.5 );
10196 if( coming_to_stairs.size() > 4 ) {
10197 add_msg( _( "The are a lot of them on the %s!" ), m.tername( u.pos() ) );
10198 dexroll /= 4;
10199 strroll /= 2;
10200 } else if( coming_to_stairs.size() > 1 ) {
10201 add_msg( m_warning, _( "There's something else behind it!" ) );
10202 dexroll /= 2;
10203 }
10204
10205 if( dexroll < 14 || strroll < 12 ) {
10206 update_stair_monsters();
10207 u.moves -= 100;
10208 return;
10209 }
10210
10211 add_msg( _( "You manage to slip past!" ) );
10212 slippedpast = true;
10213 u.moves -= 100;
10214 }
10215
10216 // Shift the map up or down
10217
10218 std::unique_ptr<map> tmp_map_ptr;
10219 if( !m.has_zlevels() ) {
10220 tmp_map_ptr = std::make_unique<map>();
10221 }
10222
10223 map &maybetmp = m.has_zlevels() ? m : *( tmp_map_ptr.get() );
10224 if( m.has_zlevels() ) {
10225 // We no longer need to shift the map here! What joy
10226 } else {
10227 maybetmp.load( tripoint( get_levx(), get_levy(), z_after ), false );
10228 }
10229
10230 // Find the corresponding staircase
10231 bool rope_ladder = false;
10232 // TODO: Remove the stairfinding, make the mapgen gen aligned maps
10233 if( !force && !climbing ) {
10234 const cata::optional<tripoint> pnt = find_or_make_stairs( maybetmp, z_after, rope_ladder, peeking );
10235 if( !pnt ) {
10236 return;
10237 }
10238 stairs = *pnt;
10239 }
10240
10241 if( !force ) {
10242 monstairz = z_before;
10243 }
10244 // Save all monsters that can reach the stairs, remove them from the tracker,
10245 // then despawn the remaining monsters. Because it's a vertical shift, all
10246 // monsters are out of the bounds of the map and will despawn.
10247 shared_ptr_fast<monster> stored_mount;
10248 if( u.is_mounted() && !m.has_zlevels() ) {
10249 // Store a *copy* of the mount, so we can remove the original monster instance
10250 // from the tracker before the map shifts.
10251 // Map shifting would otherwise just despawn the mount and would later respawn it.
10252 stored_mount = make_shared_fast<monster>( *u.mounted_creature );
10253 critter_tracker->remove( *u.mounted_creature );
10254 }
10255 if( !m.has_zlevels() ) {
10256 const tripoint to = u.pos();
10257 for( monster &critter : all_monsters() ) {
10258 // if its a ladder instead of stairs - most zombies can't climb that.
10259 // unless that have a special flag to allow them to do so.
10260 if( ( m.has_flag( "DIFFICULT_Z", u.pos() ) && !critter.climbs() ) ||
10261 critter.has_effect( effect_ridden ) ||
10262 critter.has_effect( effect_tied ) ) {
10263 continue;
10264 }
10265 int turns = critter.turns_to_reach( to.xy() );
10266 if( turns < 10 && coming_to_stairs.size() < 8 && critter.will_reach( to.xy() )
10267 && !slippedpast ) {
10268 critter.staircount = 10 + turns;
10269 critter.on_unload();
10270 coming_to_stairs.push_back( critter );
10271 remove_zombie( critter );
10272 }
10273 }
10274 auto mons = critter_tracker->find( g->u.pos() );
10275 if( mons != nullptr ) {
10276 critter_tracker->remove( *mons );
10277 }
10278 shift_monsters( tripoint( 0, 0, movez ) );
10279 }
10280
10281 std::vector<shared_ptr_fast<npc>> npcs_to_bring;
10282 std::vector<monster *> monsters_following;
10283 if( !m.has_zlevels() && std::abs( movez ) == 1 ) {
10284 std::copy_if( active_npc.begin(), active_npc.end(), back_inserter( npcs_to_bring ),
10285 [this]( const shared_ptr_fast<npc> &np ) {
10286 return np->is_walking_with() && !np->is_mounted() && !np->in_sleep_state() &&
10287 rl_dist( np->pos(), u.pos() ) < 2;
10288 } );
10289 }
10290
10291 if( m.has_zlevels() && std::abs( movez ) == 1 ) {
10292 bool ladder = m.has_flag( "DIFFICULT_Z", u.pos() );
10293 for( monster &critter : all_monsters() ) {
10294 if( ladder && !critter.climbs() ) {
10295 continue;
10296 }
10297 if( critter.attack_target() == &g->u || ( !critter.has_effect( effect_ridden ) &&
10298 critter.has_effect( effect_pet ) && critter.friendly == -1 &&
10299 !critter.has_effect( effect_tied ) ) ) {
10300 monsters_following.push_back( &critter );
10301 }
10302 }
10303 }
10304
10305 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10306 monster *crit = u.mounted_creature.get();
10307 if( crit->has_flag( MF_RIDEABLE_MECH ) ) {
10308 crit->use_mech_power( -1 );
10309 if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_WALK ) ) {
10310 crit->use_mech_power( -2 );
10311 } else if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_CROUCH ) ) {
10312 crit->use_mech_power( -1 );
10313 } else if( u.movement_mode_is( CMM_RUN ) ) {
10314 crit->use_mech_power( -3 );
10315 }
10316 }
10317 } else {
10318 u.moves -= move_cost;
10319 }
10320 for( const auto &np : npcs_to_bring ) {
10321 if( np->in_vehicle ) {
10322 m.unboard_vehicle( np->pos() );
10323 }
10324 }
10325 const tripoint old_pos = g->u.pos();
10326 point submap_shift;
10327 vertical_shift( z_after );
10328 if( !force ) {
10329 submap_shift = update_map( stairs.x, stairs.y );
10330 }
10331
10332 // if an NPC or monster is on the stiars when player ascends/descends
10333 // they may end up merged on th esame tile, do some displacement to resolve that.
10334 // if, in the weird case of it not being possible to displace;
10335 // ( how did the player even manage to approach the stairs, if so? )
10336 // then nothing terrible happens, its just weird.
10337 if( critter_at<npc>( u.pos(), true ) || critter_at<monster>( u.pos(), true ) ) {
10338 std::string crit_name;
10339 bool player_displace = false;
10340 cata::optional<tripoint> displace = find_empty_spot_nearby( u.pos() );
10341 if( displace.has_value() ) {
10342 npc *guy = g->critter_at<npc>( u.pos(), true );
10343 if( guy ) {
10344 crit_name = guy->get_name();
10345 tripoint old_pos = guy->pos();
10346 if( !guy->is_enemy() ) {
10347 guy->move_away_from( u.pos(), true );
10348 if( old_pos != guy->pos() ) {
10349 add_msg( _( "%s moves out of the way for you." ), guy->get_name() );
10350 }
10351 } else {
10352 player_displace = true;
10353 }
10354 }
10355 monster *mon = g->critter_at<monster>( u.pos(), true );
10356 // if the monster is ridden by the player or an NPC:
10357 // Dont displace them. If they are mounted by a friendly NPC,
10358 // then the NPC will already have been displaced just above.
10359 // if they are ridden by the player, we want them to coexist on same tile
10360 if( mon && !mon->mounted_player ) {
10361 crit_name = mon->get_name();
10362 if( mon->friendly == -1 ) {
10363 mon->setpos( *displace );
10364 add_msg( _( "Your %s moves out of the way for you." ), mon->get_name() );
10365 } else {
10366 player_displace = true;
10367 }
10368 }
10369 if( player_displace ) {
10370 u.setpos( *displace );
10371 u.moves -= 20;
10372 add_msg( _( "You push past %s blocking the way." ), crit_name );
10373 }
10374 } else {
10375 debugmsg( "Failed to find a spot to displace into." );
10376 }
10377 }
10378
10379 // Now that we know the player's destination position, we can move their mount as well
10380 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
10381 if( stored_mount ) {
10382 assert( !m.has_zlevels() );
10383 stored_mount->spawn( g->u.pos() );
10384 if( critter_tracker->add( stored_mount ) ) {
10385 u.mounted_creature = stored_mount;
10386 }
10387 } else {
10388 u.mounted_creature->setpos( g->u.pos() );
10389 }
10390 }
10391
10392 if( !npcs_to_bring.empty() ) {
10393 // Would look nicer randomly scrambled
10394 std::vector<tripoint> candidates = closest_points_first( u.pos(), 1 );
10395 candidates.erase( std::remove_if( candidates.begin(), candidates.end(),
10396 [this]( const tripoint & c ) {
10397 return !is_empty( c );
10398 } ), candidates.end() );
10399
10400 for( const auto &np : npcs_to_bring ) {
10401 const auto found = std::find_if( candidates.begin(), candidates.end(),
10402 [this, np]( const tripoint & c ) {
10403 return !np->is_dangerous_fields( m.field_at( c ) ) && m.tr_at( c ).is_benign();
10404 } );
10405 if( found != candidates.end() ) {
10406 // TODO: De-uglify
10407 np->setpos( *found );
10408 np->place_on_map();
10409 np->setpos( *found );
10410 candidates.erase( found );
10411 }
10412
10413 if( candidates.empty() ) {
10414 break;
10415 }
10416 }
10417
10418 reload_npcs();
10419 }
10420
10421 // This ugly check is here because of stair teleport bullshit
10422 // TODO: Remove stair teleport bullshit
10423 if( rl_dist( g->u.pos(), old_pos ) <= 1 ) {
10424 for( monster *m : monsters_following ) {
10425 m->set_dest( g->u.pos() );
10426 }
10427 }
10428
10429 if( rope_ladder ) {
10430 m.ter_set( u.pos(), t_rope_up );
10431 }
10432
10433 if( m.ter( stairs ) == t_manhole_cover ) {
10434 m.spawn_item( stairs + point( rng( -1, 1 ), rng( -1, 1 ) ), itype_manhole_cover );
10435 m.ter_set( stairs, t_manhole );
10436 }
10437
10438 // Wouldn't work and may do strange things
10439 if( u.is_hauling() && !m.has_zlevels() ) {
10440 add_msg( _( "You cannot haul items here." ) );
10441 u.stop_hauling();
10442 }
10443
10444 if( u.is_hauling() ) {
10445 const tripoint adjusted_pos = old_pos - sm_to_ms_copy( submap_shift );
10446 start_hauling( adjusted_pos );
10447 }
10448
10449 m.invalidate_map_cache( g->get_levz() );
10450 // Upon force movement, traps can not be avoided.
10451 m.creature_on_trap( u, !force );
10452
10453 cata_event_dispatch::avatar_moves( u, m, u.pos() );
10454}
10455
10456void game::start_hauling( const tripoint &pos )
10457{
10458 // Find target items and quantities thereof for the new activity
10459 std::vector<item_location> target_items;
10460 std::vector<int> quantities;
10461
10462 map_stack items = m.i_at( pos );
10463 for( item &it : items ) {
10464 // Liquid cannot be picked up
10465 if( it.made_of( LIQUID ) ) {
10466 continue;
10467 }
10468 target_items.emplace_back( map_cursor( pos ), &it );
10469 // Quantity of 0 means move all
10470 quantities.push_back( 0 );
10471 }
10472
10473 if( target_items.empty() ) {
10474 // Nothing to haul
10475 return;
10476 }
10477
10478 // Whether the destination is inside a vehicle (not supported)
10479 const bool to_vehicle = false;
10480 // Destination relative to the player
10481 const tripoint relative_destination{};
10482
10483 u.assign_activity( player_activity( move_items_activity_actor(
10484 target_items,
10485 quantities,
10486 to_vehicle,
10487 relative_destination
10488 ) ) );
10489}
10490
10491cata::optional<tripoint> game::find_or_make_stairs( map &mp, const int z_after, bool &rope_ladder,
10492 bool peeking )
10493{
10494 const int omtilesz = SEEX * 2;
10495 real_coords rc( m.getabs( point( u.posx(), u.posy() ) ) );
10496 tripoint omtile_align_start( m.getlocal( rc.begin_om_pos() ), z_after );
10497 tripoint omtile_align_end( omtile_align_start + point( -1 + omtilesz, -1 + omtilesz ) );
10498
10499 // Try to find the stairs.
10500 cata::optional<tripoint> stairs;
10501 int best = INT_MAX;
10502 const int movez = z_after - get_levz();
10503 const bool going_down_1 = movez == -1;
10504 const bool going_up_1 = movez == 1;
10505 // If there are stairs on the same x and y as we currently are, use those
10506 if( going_down_1 && mp.has_flag( TFLAG_GOES_UP, u.pos() + tripoint_below ) ) {
10507 stairs.emplace( u.pos() + tripoint_below );
10508 }
10509 if( going_up_1 && mp.has_flag( TFLAG_GOES_DOWN, u.pos() + tripoint_above ) ) {
10510 stairs.emplace( u.pos() + tripoint_above );
10511 }
10512 // We did not find stairs directly above or below, so search the map for them
10513 if( !stairs.has_value() ) {
10514 for( const tripoint &dest : m.points_in_rectangle( omtile_align_start, omtile_align_end ) ) {
10515 if( rl_dist( u.pos(), dest ) <= best &&
10516 ( ( going_down_1 && mp.has_flag( TFLAG_GOES_UP, dest ) ) ||
10517 ( going_up_1 && ( mp.has_flag( TFLAG_GOES_DOWN, dest ) ||
10518 mp.ter( dest ) == t_manhole_cover ) ) ||
10519 ( ( movez == 2 || movez == -2 ) && mp.ter( dest ) == t_elevator ) ) ) {
10520 stairs.emplace( dest );
10521 best = rl_dist( u.pos(), dest );
10522 }
10523 }
10524 }
10525
10526 if( stairs.has_value() ) {
10527 if( Creature *blocking_creature = critter_at( stairs.value() ) ) {
10528 npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( blocking_creature );
10529 monster *mon = dynamic_cast<monster *>( blocking_creature );
10530 bool would_move = ( guy && !guy->is_enemy() ) || ( mon && mon->friendly == -1 );
10531 bool can_displace = find_empty_spot_nearby( *stairs ).has_value();
10532 std::string cr_name = blocking_creature->get_name();
10533 std::string msg;
10534 if( guy ) {
10535 //~ %s is the name of hostile NPC
10536 msg = string_format( _( "%s is in the way!" ), cr_name );
10537 } else {
10538 //~ %s is some monster
10539 msg = string_format( _( "There's a %s in the way!" ), cr_name );
10540 }
10541
10542 if( ( peeking && !would_move ) || !can_displace || ( !would_move && !query_yn(
10543 //~ %s is a warning about monster/hostile NPC in the way, e.g. "There's a zombie in the way!"
10544 _( "%s Attempt to push past? You may have to fight your way back up." ), msg ) ) ) {
10545 add_msg( msg );
10546 return cata::nullopt;
10547 }
10548 }
10549 return stairs;
10550 }
10551
10552 // No stairs found! Try to make some
10553 rope_ladder = false;
10554 stairs.emplace( u.pos() );
10555 stairs->z = z_after;
10556 // Check the destination area for lava.
10557 if( mp.ter( *stairs ) == t_lava ) {
10558 if( movez < 0 &&
10559 !query_yn(
10560 _( "There is a LOT of heat coming out of there, even the stairs have melted away. Jump down? You won't be able to get back up." ) ) ) {
10561 return cata::nullopt;
10562 } else if( movez > 0 &&
10563 !query_yn(
10564 _( "There is a LOT of heat coming out of there. Push through the half-molten rocks and ascend? You will not be able to get back down." ) ) ) {
10565 return cata::nullopt;
10566 }
10567
10568 return stairs;
10569 }
10570
10571 if( movez > 0 ) {
10572 if( !mp.has_flag( "GOES_DOWN", *stairs ) ) {
10573 if( !query_yn( _( "You may be unable to return back down these stairs. Continue up?" ) ) ) {
10574 return cata::nullopt;
10575 }
10576 }
10577 // Manhole covers need this to work
10578 // Maybe require manhole cover here and fail otherwise?
10579 return stairs;
10580 }
10581
10582 if( mp.impassable( *stairs ) ) {
10583 popup( _( "Halfway down, the way down becomes blocked off." ) );
10584 return cata::nullopt;
10585 }
10586
10587 if( u.has_trait( trait_id( "WEB_RAPPEL" ) ) ) {
10588 if( query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Web-descend?" ) ) ) {
10589 rope_ladder = true;
10590 if( ( rng( 4, 8 ) ) < u.get_skill_level( skill_dodge ) ) {
10591 add_msg( _( "You attach a web and dive down headfirst, flipping upright and landing on your feet." ) );
10592 } else {
10593 add_msg( _( "You securely web up and work your way down, lowering yourself safely." ) );
10594 }
10595 } else {
10596 return cata::nullopt;
10597 }
10598 } else if( u.has_trait( trait_VINES2 ) || u.has_trait( trait_VINES3 ) ) {
10599 if( query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Use your vines to descend?" ) ) ) {
10600 if( u.has_trait( trait_VINES2 ) ) {
10601 if( query_yn( _( "Detach a vine? It'll hurt, but you'll be able to climb back up" ) ) ) {
10602 rope_ladder = true;
10603 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You descend on your vines, though leaving a part of you behind stings." ) );
10604 u.mod_pain( 5 );
10605 u.apply_damage( nullptr, bodypart_id( "torso" ), 5 );
10606 u.mod_stored_nutr( 10 );
10607 u.mod_thirst( 10 );
10608 } else {
10609 add_msg( _( "You gingerly descend using your vines." ) );
10610 }
10611 } else {
10612 add_msg( _( "You effortlessly lower yourself and leave a vine rooted for future use." ) );
10613 rope_ladder = true;
10614 u.mod_stored_nutr( 10 );
10615 u.mod_thirst( 10 );
10616 }
10617 } else {
10618 return cata::nullopt;
10619 }
10620 } else if( u.has_amount( itype_grapnel, 1 ) ) {
10621 if( query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Climb your grappling hook down?" ) ) ) {
10622 rope_ladder = true;
10623 u.use_amount( itype_grapnel, 1 );
10624 } else {
10625 return cata::nullopt;
10626 }
10627 } else if( u.has_amount( itype_rope_30, 1 ) ) {
10628 if( query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Climb your rope down?" ) ) ) {
10629 rope_ladder = true;
10630 u.use_amount( itype_rope_30, 1 );
10631 } else {
10632 return cata::nullopt;
10633 }
10634 } else if( !query_yn( _( "There is a sheer drop halfway down. Jump?" ) ) ) {
10635 return cata::nullopt;
10636 }
10637
10638 return stairs;
10639}
10640
10641void game::vertical_shift( const int z_after )
10642{
10643 if( z_after < -OVERMAP_DEPTH || z_after > OVERMAP_HEIGHT ) {
10644 debugmsg( "Tried to get z-level %d outside allowed range of %d-%d",
10645 z_after, -OVERMAP_DEPTH, OVERMAP_HEIGHT );
10646 return;
10647 }
10648
10649 // TODO: Implement dragging stuff up/down
10650 u.grab( OBJECT_NONE );
10651
10652 scent.reset();
10653
10654 u.setz( z_after );
10655 const int z_before = get_levz();
10656 if( !m.has_zlevels() ) {
10657 m.clear_vehicle_cache( );
10658 m.access_cache( z_before ).vehicle_list.clear();
10659 m.access_cache( z_before ).zone_vehicles.clear();
10660 m.access_cache( z_before ).map_memory_seen_cache.reset();
10661 m.set_transparency_cache_dirty( z_before );
10662 m.set_outside_cache_dirty( z_before );
10663 m.load( tripoint( get_levx(), get_levy(), z_after ), true );
10664 shift_monsters( tripoint( 0, 0, z_after - z_before ) );
10665 reload_npcs();
10666 } else {
10667 // Shift the map itself
10668 m.vertical_shift( z_after );
10669 }
10670
10671 m.spawn_monsters( true );
10672 // this may be required after a vertical shift if z-levels are not enabled
10673 // the critter is unloaded/loaded, and it needs to reconstruct its rider data after being reloaded.
10674 validate_mounted_npcs();
10675 vertical_notes( z_before, z_after );
10676}
10677
10678void game::vertical_notes( int z_before, int z_after )
10679{
10680 if( z_before == z_after || !get_option<bool>( "AUTO_NOTES" ) ||
10681 !get_option<bool>( "AUTO_NOTES_STAIRS" ) ) {
10682 return;
10683 }
10684
10685 if( !m.inbounds_z( z_before ) || !m.inbounds_z( z_after ) ) {
10686 debugmsg( "game::vertical_notes invalid arguments: z_before == %d, z_after == %d",
10687 z_before, z_after );
10688 return;
10689 }
10690 // Figure out where we know there are up/down connectors
10691 // Fill in all the tiles we know about (e.g. subway stations)
10692 static const int REVEAL_RADIUS = 40;
10693 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &p : points_in_radius( u.global_omt_location(), REVEAL_RADIUS ) ) {
10694 const tripoint_abs_omt cursp_before( p.xy(), z_before );
10695 const tripoint_abs_omt cursp_after( p.xy(), z_after );
10696
10697 if( !overmap_buffer.seen( cursp_before ) ) {
10698 continue;
10699 }
10700 if( overmap_buffer.has_note( cursp_after ) ) {
10701 // Already has a note -> never add an AUTO-note
10702 continue;
10703 }
10704 const oter_id &ter = overmap_buffer.ter( cursp_before );
10705 const oter_id &ter2 = overmap_buffer.ter( cursp_after );
10706 if( z_after > z_before && ter->has_flag( known_up ) &&
10707 !ter2->has_flag( known_down ) ) {
10708 overmap_buffer.set_seen( cursp_after, true );
10709 overmap_buffer.add_note( cursp_after, string_format( ">:W;%s", _( "AUTO: goes down" ) ) );
10710 } else if( z_after < z_before && ter->has_flag( known_down ) &&
10711 !ter2->has_flag( known_up ) ) {
10712 overmap_buffer.set_seen( cursp_after, true );
10713 overmap_buffer.add_note( cursp_after, string_format( "<:W;%s", _( "AUTO: goes up" ) ) );
10714 }
10715 }
10716}
10717
10718point game::update_map( player &p )
10719{
10720 point p2( p.posx(), p.posy() );
10721 return update_map( p2.x, p2.y );
10722}
10723
10724point game::update_map( int &x, int &y )
10725{
10726 point shift;
10727
10728 while( x < HALF_MAPSIZE_X ) {
10729 x += SEEX;
10730 shift.x--;
10731 }
10732 while( x >= HALF_MAPSIZE_X + SEEX ) {
10733 x -= SEEX;
10734 shift.x++;
10735 }
10736 while( y < HALF_MAPSIZE_Y ) {
10737 y += SEEY;
10738 shift.y--;
10739 }
10740 while( y >= HALF_MAPSIZE_Y + SEEY ) {
10741 y -= SEEY;
10742 shift.y++;
10743 }
10744
10745 if( shift == point_zero ) {
10746 // adjust player position
10747 u.setpos( tripoint( x, y, get_levz() ) );
10748 // Update what parts of the world map we can see
10749 // We need this call because even if the map hasn't shifted we may have changed z-level and can now see farther
10750 // TODO: only make this call if we changed z-level
10751 update_overmap_seen();
10752 // Not actually shifting the submaps, all the stuff below would do nothing
10753 return point_zero;
10754 }
10755
10756 // this handles loading/unloading submaps that have scrolled on or off the viewport
10757 // NOLINTNEXTLINE(cata-use-named-point-constants)
10758 inclusive_rectangle<point> size_1( point( -1, -1 ), point( 1, 1 ) );
10759 point remaining_shift = shift;
10760 while( remaining_shift != point_zero ) {
10761 point this_shift = clamp( remaining_shift, size_1 );
10762 m.shift( this_shift );
10763 remaining_shift -= this_shift;
10764 }
10765
10766 grid_tracker_ptr->load( m );
10767
10768 // Shift monsters
10769 shift_monsters( tripoint( shift, 0 ) );
10770 const point shift_ms = sm_to_ms_copy( shift );
10771 u.shift_destination( -shift_ms );
10772
10773 // Shift NPCs
10774 for( auto it = active_npc.begin(); it != active_npc.end(); ) {
10775 ( *it )->shift( shift );
10776 if( ( *it )->posx() < 0 - SEEX * 2 || ( *it )->posy() < 0 - SEEX * 2 ||
10777 ( *it )->posx() > SEEX * ( MAPSIZE + 2 ) || ( *it )->posy() > SEEY * ( MAPSIZE + 2 ) ) {
10778 //Remove the npc from the active list. It remains in the overmap list.
10779 ( *it )->on_unload();
10780 it = active_npc.erase( it );
10781 } else {
10782 it++;
10783 }
10784 }
10785
10786 scent.shift( shift_ms );
10787
10788 // Also ensure the player is on current z-level
10789 // get_levz() should later be removed, when there is no longer such a thing
10790 // as "current z-level"
10791 u.setpos( tripoint( x, y, get_levz() ) );
10792
10793 // Only do the loading after all coordinates have been shifted.
10794
10795 // Check for overmap saved npcs that should now come into view.
10796 // Put those in the active list.
10797 load_npcs();
10798
10799 // Make sure map cache is consistent since it may have shifted.
10800 if( m.has_zlevels() ) {
10801 for( int zlev = -OVERMAP_DEPTH; zlev <= OVERMAP_HEIGHT; ++zlev ) {
10802 m.invalidate_map_cache( zlev );
10803 }
10804 } else {
10805 m.invalidate_map_cache( get_levz() );
10806 }
10807 m.build_map_cache( get_levz() );
10808
10809 // Spawn monsters if appropriate
10810 // This call will generate new monsters in addition to loading, so it's placed after NPC loading
10811 m.spawn_monsters( false ); // Static monsters
10812
10813 // Update what parts of the world map we can see
10814 update_overmap_seen();
10815
10816 return shift;
10817}
10818
10819void game::update_overmap_seen()
10820{
10821 const tripoint_abs_omt ompos = u.global_omt_location();
10822 const int dist = u.overmap_sight_range( light_level( u.posz() ) );
10823 const int dist_squared = dist * dist;
10824 // We can always see where we're standing
10825 overmap_buffer.set_seen( ompos, true );
10826 for( const tripoint_abs_omt &p : points_in_radius( ompos, dist ) ) {
10827 const point_rel_omt delta = p.xy() - ompos.xy();
10828 const int h_squared = delta.x() * delta.x() + delta.y() * delta.y();
10829 if( trigdist && h_squared > dist_squared ) {
10830 continue;
10831 }
10832 if( delta == point_rel_omt() ) {
10833 // 1. This case is already handled outside of the loop
10834 // 2. Calculating multiplier would cause division by zero
10835 continue;
10836 }
10837 // If circular distances are enabled, scale overmap distances by the diagonality of the sight line.
10838 point abs_delta = delta.raw().abs();
10839 int max_delta = std::max( abs_delta.x, abs_delta.y );
10840 const float multiplier = trigdist ? std::sqrt( h_squared ) / max_delta : 1;
10841 const std::vector<tripoint_abs_omt> line = line_to( ompos, p );
10842 float sight_points = dist;
10843 for( auto it = line.begin();
10844 it != line.end() && sight_points >= 0; ++it ) {
10845 const oter_id &ter = overmap_buffer.ter( *it );
10846 sight_points -= static_cast<int>( ter->get_see_cost() ) * multiplier;
10847 }
10848 if( sight_points >= 0 ) {
10849 tripoint_abs_omt seen( p );
10850 do {
10851 overmap_buffer.set_seen( seen, true );
10852 --seen.z();
10853 } while( seen.z() >= 0 );
10854 }
10855 }
10856}
10857
10858void game::replace_stair_monsters()
10859{
10860 for( auto &elem : coming_to_stairs ) {
10861 elem.staircount = 0;
10862 const tripoint pnt( elem.pos().xy(), get_levz() );
10863 place_critter_around( make_shared_fast<monster>( elem ), pnt, 10 );
10864 }
10865
10866 coming_to_stairs.clear();
10867}
10868
10869// TODO: abstract out the location checking code
10870// TODO: refactor so zombies can follow up and down stairs instead of this mess
10871void game::update_stair_monsters()
10872{
10873 // Search for the stairs closest to the player.
10874 std::vector<int> stairx;
10875 std::vector<int> stairy;
10876 std::vector<int> stairdist;
10877
10878 const bool from_below = monstairz < get_levz();
10879
10880 if( coming_to_stairs.empty() ) {
10881 return;
10882 }
10883
10884 if( m.has_zlevels() ) {
10885 debugmsg( "%d monsters coming to stairs on a map with z-levels",
10886 coming_to_stairs.size() );
10887 coming_to_stairs.clear();
10888 }
10889
10890 for( const tripoint &dest : m.points_on_zlevel( u.posz() ) ) {
10891 if( ( from_below && m.has_flag( "GOES_DOWN", dest ) ) ||
10892 ( !from_below && m.has_flag( "GOES_UP", dest ) ) ) {
10893 stairx.push_back( dest.x );
10894 stairy.push_back( dest.y );
10895 stairdist.push_back( rl_dist( dest, u.pos() ) );
10896 }
10897 }
10898 if( stairdist.empty() ) {
10899 return; // Found no stairs?
10900 }
10901
10902 // Find closest stairs.
10903 size_t si = 0;
10904 for( size_t i = 0; i < stairdist.size(); i++ ) {
10905 if( stairdist[i] < stairdist[si] ) {
10906 si = i;
10907 }
10908 }
10909
10910 // Find up to 4 stairs for distance stairdist[si] +1
10911 std::vector<int> nearest;
10912 nearest.push_back( si );
10913 for( size_t i = 0; i < stairdist.size() && nearest.size() < 4; i++ ) {
10914 if( ( i != si ) && ( stairdist[i] <= stairdist[si] + 1 ) ) {
10915 nearest.push_back( i );
10916 }
10917 }
10918 // Randomize the stair choice
10919 si = random_entry_ref( nearest );
10920
10921 // Attempt to spawn zombies.
10922 for( size_t i = 0; i < coming_to_stairs.size(); i++ ) {
10923 point mpos( stairx[si], stairy[si] );
10924 monster &critter = coming_to_stairs[i];
10925 const tripoint dest {
10926 mpos, g->get_levz()
10927 };
10928
10929 // We might be not be visible.
10930 if( ( critter.posx() < 0 - ( MAPSIZE_X ) / 6 ||
10931 critter.posy() < 0 - ( MAPSIZE_Y ) / 6 ||
10932 critter.posx() > ( MAPSIZE_X * 7 ) / 6 ||
10933 critter.posy() > ( MAPSIZE_Y * 7 ) / 6 ) ) {
10934 continue;
10935 }
10936
10937 critter.staircount -= 4;
10938 // Let the player know zombies are trying to come.
10939 if( u.sees( dest ) ) {
10940 std::string dump;
10941 if( critter.staircount > 4 ) {
10942 dump += string_format( _( "You see a %s on the stairs" ), critter.name() );
10943 } else {
10944 if( critter.staircount > 0 ) {
10945 dump += ( from_below ?
10946 //~ The <monster> is almost at the <bottom/top> of the <terrain type>!
10947 string_format( _( "The %1$s is almost at the top of the %2$s!" ),
10948 critter.name(),
10949 m.tername( dest ) ) :
10950 string_format( _( "The %1$s is almost at the bottom of the %2$s!" ),
10951 critter.name(),
10952 m.tername( dest ) ) );
10953 }
10954 }
10955
10956 add_msg( m_warning, dump );
10957 } else {
10958 sounds::sound( dest, 5, sounds::sound_t::movement,
10959 _( "a sound nearby from the stairs!" ), true, "misc", "stairs_movement" );
10960 }
10961
10962 if( critter.staircount > 0 ) {
10963 continue;
10964 }
10965
10966 if( is_empty( dest ) ) {
10967 critter.spawn( dest );
10968 critter.staircount = 0;
10969 place_critter_at( make_shared_fast<monster>( critter ), dest );
10970 if( u.sees( dest ) ) {
10971 if( !from_below ) {
10972 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %1$s comes down the %2$s!" ),
10973 critter.name(),
10974 m.tername( dest ) );
10975 } else {
10976 add_msg( m_warning, _( "The %1$s comes up the %2$s!" ),
10977 critter.name(),
10978 m.tername( dest ) );
10979 }
10980 }
10981 coming_to_stairs.erase( coming_to_stairs.begin() + i );
10982 continue;
10983 } else if( u.pos() == dest ) {
10984 // Monster attempts to push player of stairs
10985 point push( point_north_west );
10986 int tries = 0;
10987
10988 // the critter is now right on top of you and will attack unless
10989 // it can find a square to push you into with one of his tries.
10990 const int creature_push_attempts = 9;
10991 const int player_throw_resist_chance = 3;
10992
10993 critter.spawn( dest );
10994 while( tries < creature_push_attempts ) {
10995 tries++;
10996 push.x = rng( -1, 1 );
10997 push.y = rng( -1, 1 );
10998 point ipos( mpos + push );
10999 tripoint pos( ipos, get_levz() );
11000 if( ( push.x != 0 || push.y != 0 ) && !critter_at( pos ) &&
11001 critter.can_move_to( pos ) ) {
11002 bool resiststhrow = ( u.is_throw_immune() ) ||
11003 ( u.has_trait( trait_LEG_TENT_BRACE ) );
11004 if( resiststhrow && one_in( player_throw_resist_chance ) ) {
11005 u.moves -= 25; // small charge for avoiding the push altogether
11006 add_msg( _( "The %s fails to push you back!" ),
11007 critter.name() );
11008 return; //judo or leg brace prevent you from getting pushed at all
11009 }
11010 // Not accounting for tentacles latching on, so..
11011 // Something is about to happen, lets charge half a move
11012 u.moves -= 50;
11013 if( resiststhrow && ( u.is_throw_immune() ) ) {
11014 //we have a judoka who isn't getting pushed but counterattacking now.
11015 mattack::thrown_by_judo( &critter );
11016 return;
11017 }
11018 std::string msg;
11019 ///\EFFECT_DODGE reduces chance of being downed when pushed off the stairs
11020 if( !( resiststhrow ) && ( u.get_dodge() + rng( 0, 3 ) < 12 ) ) {
11021 // dodge 12 - never get downed
11022 // 11.. avoid 75%; 10.. avoid 50%; 9.. avoid 25%
11023 u.add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns );
11024 msg = _( "The %s pushed you back hard!" );
11025 } else {
11026 msg = _( "The %s pushed you back!" );
11027 }
11028 add_msg( m_warning, msg.c_str(), critter.name() );
11029 u.setx( u.posx() + push.x );
11030 u.sety( u.posy() + push.y );
11031 return;
11032 }
11033 }
11034 add_msg( m_warning,
11035 _( "The %s tried to push you back but failed! It attacks you!" ),
11036 critter.name() );
11037 critter.melee_attack( u );
11038 u.moves -= 50;
11039 return;
11040 } else if( monster *const mon_ptr = critter_at<monster>( dest ) ) {
11041 // Monster attempts to displace a monster from the stairs
11042 monster &other = *mon_ptr;
11043 critter.spawn( dest );
11044
11045 // the critter is now right on top of another and will push it
11046 // if it can find a square to push it into inside of his tries.
11047 const int creature_push_attempts = 9;
11048 const int creature_throw_resist = 4;
11049
11050 int tries = 0;
11051 point push2;
11052 while( tries < creature_push_attempts ) {
11053 tries++;
11054 push2.x = rng( -1, 1 );
11055 push2.y = rng( -1, 1 );
11056 point ipos2( mpos + push2 );
11057 tripoint pos( ipos2, get_levz() );
11058 if( ( push2.x == 0 && push2.y == 0 ) || ( ( ipos2.x == u.posx() ) && ( ipos2.y == u.posy() ) ) ) {
11059 continue;
11060 }
11061 if( !critter_at( pos ) && other.can_move_to( pos ) ) {
11062 other.setpos( tripoint( ipos2, get_levz() ) );
11063 other.moves -= 50;
11064 std::string msg;
11065 if( one_in( creature_throw_resist ) ) {
11066 other.add_effect( effect_downed, 2_turns );
11067 msg = _( "The %1$s pushed the %2$s hard." );
11068 } else {
11069 msg = _( "The %1$s pushed the %2$s." );
11070 }
11071 add_msg( m_neutral, msg, critter.name(), other.name() );
11072 return;
11073 }
11074 }
11075 return;
11076 }
11077 }
11078}
11079
11080void game::despawn_monster( monster &critter )
11081{
11082 if( !critter.is_hallucination() ) {
11083 // hallucinations aren't stored, they come and go as they like,
11084 overmap_buffer.despawn_monster( critter );
11085 }
11086
11087 critter.on_unload();
11088 remove_zombie( critter );
11089 // simulate it being dead so further processing of it (e.g. in monmove) will yield
11090 critter.set_hp( 0 );
11091}
11092
11093void game::shift_monsters( const tripoint &shift )
11094{
11095 // If either shift argument is non-zero, we're shifting.
11096 if( shift == tripoint_zero ) {
11097 return;
11098 }
11099 for( monster &critter : all_monsters() ) {
11100 if( shift.xy() != point_zero ) {
11101 critter.shift( shift.xy() );
11102 }
11103
11104 if( m.inbounds( critter.pos() ) && ( shift.z == 0 || m.has_zlevels() ) ) {
11105 // We're inbounds, so don't despawn after all.
11106 // No need to shift Z-coordinates, they are absolute
11107 continue;
11108 }
11109 // Either a vertical shift or the critter is now outside of the reality bubble,
11110 // anyway: it must be saved and removed.
11111 despawn_monster( critter );
11112 }
11113 // The order in which zombies are shifted may cause zombies to briefly exist on
11114 // the same square. This messes up the mon_at cache, so we need to rebuild it.
11115 critter_tracker->rebuild_cache();
11116}
11117
11118void game::perhaps_add_random_npc()
11119{
11120 if( !calendar::once_every( 1_hours ) ) {
11121 return;
11122 }
11123 // Create a new NPC?
11124 // Only allow NPCs on 0 z-level, otherwise they can bug out due to lack of spots
11125 if( !get_option<bool>( "RANDOM_NPC" ) || ( !m.has_zlevels() && get_levz() != 0 ) ) {
11126 return;
11127 }
11128
11129 float density = get_option<float>( "NPC_DENSITY" );
11130 static constexpr int density_search_radius = 60;
11131 const float npc_num = overmap_buffer.get_npcs_near_player( density_search_radius ).size();
11132 if( npc_num > 0.0 ) {
11133 // 100%, 80%, 64%, 52%, 41%, 33%...
11134 density *= std::pow( 0.8f, npc_num );
11135 }
11136
11137 if( !x_in_y( density, 100 ) ) {
11138 return;
11139 }
11140 bool spawn_allowed = false;
11141 tripoint_abs_omt spawn_point;
11142 int counter = 0;
11143 while( !spawn_allowed ) {
11144 if( counter >= 10 ) {
11145 return;
11146 }
11147 static constexpr int radius_spawn_range = 120;
11148 const tripoint_abs_omt u_omt = u.global_omt_location();
11149 spawn_point = u_omt + point( rng( -radius_spawn_range, radius_spawn_range ),
11150 rng( -radius_spawn_range, radius_spawn_range ) );
11151 spawn_point.z() = 0;
11152 const oter_id oter = overmap_buffer.ter( spawn_point );
11153 // shouldn't spawn on lakes or rivers.
11154 if( !is_river_or_lake( oter ) ) {
11155 spawn_allowed = true;
11156 }
11157 counter += 1;
11158 }
11159 shared_ptr_fast<npc> tmp = make_shared_fast<npc>();
11160 tmp->normalize();
11161 tmp->randomize();
11162 std::string new_fac_id = "solo_";
11163 new_fac_id += tmp->name;
11164 // create a new "lone wolf" faction for this one NPC
11165 faction *new_solo_fac = faction_manager_ptr->add_new_faction( tmp->name, faction_id( new_fac_id ),
11166 faction_id( "no_faction" ) );
11167 tmp->set_fac( new_solo_fac ? new_solo_fac->id : faction_id( "no_faction" ) );
11168 // adds the npc to the correct overmap.
11169 // Only spawn random NPCs on z-level 0
11170 // TODO: fix point types
11171 tripoint submap_spawn = omt_to_sm_copy( spawn_point.raw() );
11172 tmp->spawn_at_sm( tripoint( submap_spawn.xy(), 0 ) );
11173 overmap_buffer.insert_npc( tmp );
11174 tmp->form_opinion( u );
11175 tmp->mission = NPC_MISSION_NULL;
11176 tmp->long_term_goal_action();
11177 tmp->add_new_mission( mission::reserve_random( ORIGIN_ANY_NPC, tmp->global_omt_location(),
11178 tmp->getID() ) );
11179 // This will make the new NPC active- if its nearby to the player
11180 load_npcs();
11181}
11182
11183bool game::display_overlay_state( const action_id action )
11184{
11185 return displaying_overlays && *displaying_overlays == action;
11186}
11187
11188void game::display_toggle_overlay( const action_id action )
11189{
11190 if( display_overlay_state( action ) ) {
11191 displaying_overlays.reset();
11192 } else {
11193 displaying_overlays = action;
11194 }
11195}
11196
11197void game::display_scent()
11198{
11199 if( use_tiles ) {
11200 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_SCENT );
11201 } else {
11202 int div;
11203 bool got_value = query_int( div, _( "Set the Scent Map sensitivity to (0 to cancel)?" ) );
11204 if( !got_value || div < 1 ) {
11205 add_msg( _( "Never mind." ) );
11206 return;
11207 }
11208 shared_ptr_fast<game::draw_callback_t> scent_cb = make_shared_fast<game::draw_callback_t>( [&]() {
11209 scent.draw( w_terrain, div * 2, u.pos() + u.view_offset );
11210 } );
11211 g->add_draw_callback( scent_cb );
11212
11213 ui_manager::redraw();
11214 inp_mngr.wait_for_any_key();
11215 }
11216}
11217
11218void game::display_temperature()
11219{
11220 if( use_tiles ) {
11221 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_TEMPERATURE );
11222 }
11223}
11224
11225void game::display_vehicle_ai()
11226{
11227 if( use_tiles ) {
11228 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_VEHICLE_AI );
11229 }
11230}
11231
11232void game::display_visibility()
11233{
11234 if( use_tiles ) {
11235 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_VISIBILITY );
11236 if( display_overlay_state( ACTION_DISPLAY_VISIBILITY ) ) {
11237 std::vector< tripoint > locations;
11238 uilist creature_menu;
11239 int num_creatures = 0;
11240 creature_menu.addentry( num_creatures++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, "%s", _( "You" ) );
11241 locations.emplace_back( g->u.pos() ); // add player first.
11242 for( const Creature &critter : g->all_creatures() ) {
11243 if( critter.is_player() ) {
11244 continue;
11245 }
11246 creature_menu.addentry( num_creatures++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, critter.disp_name() );
11247 locations.emplace_back( critter.pos() );
11248 }
11249
11250 pointmenu_cb callback( locations );
11251 creature_menu.callback = &callback;
11252 creature_menu.w_y_setup = 0;
11253 creature_menu.query();
11254 if( creature_menu.ret >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( creature_menu.ret ) < locations.size() ) {
11255 Creature *creature = critter_at<Creature>( locations[creature_menu.ret] );
11256 displaying_visibility_creature = creature;
11257 }
11258 } else {
11259 displaying_visibility_creature = nullptr;
11260 }
11261 }
11262}
11263
11264void game::toggle_debug_hour_timer()
11265{
11266 debug_hour_timer.toggle();
11267}
11268
11269void game::debug_hour_timer::toggle()
11270{
11271 enabled = !enabled;
11272 start_time = cata::nullopt;
11273 add_msg( string_format( "debug timer %s", enabled ? "enabled" : "disabled" ) );
11274}
11275
11276void game::debug_hour_timer::print_time()
11277{
11278 if( enabled ) {
11279 if( calendar::once_every( time_duration::from_hours( 1 ) ) ) {
11280 const IRLTimeMs now = std::chrono::time_point_cast<std::chrono::milliseconds>(
11281 std::chrono::system_clock::now() );
11282 if( start_time ) {
11283 add_msg( "in-game hour took: %d ms", ( now - *start_time ).count() );
11284 } else {
11285 add_msg( "starting debug timer" );
11286 }
11287 start_time = now;
11288 }
11289 }
11290}
11291
11292void game::display_lighting()
11293{
11294 if( use_tiles ) {
11295 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_LIGHTING );
11296 if( !g->display_overlay_state( ACTION_DISPLAY_LIGHTING ) ) {
11297 return;
11298 }
11299 uilist lighting_menu;
11300 std::vector<std::string> lighting_menu_strings{
11301 "Global lighting conditions"
11302 };
11303
11304 int count = 0;
11305 for( const auto &menu_str : lighting_menu_strings ) {
11306 lighting_menu.addentry( count++, true, MENU_AUTOASSIGN, "%s", menu_str );
11307 }
11308
11309 lighting_menu.w_y_setup = 0;
11310 lighting_menu.query();
11311 if( ( lighting_menu.ret >= 0 ) &&
11312 ( static_cast<size_t>( lighting_menu.ret ) < lighting_menu_strings.size() ) ) {
11313 g->displaying_lighting_condition = lighting_menu.ret;
11314 }
11315 }
11316}
11317
11318void game::display_radiation()
11319{
11320 if( use_tiles ) {
11321 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_RADIATION );
11322 }
11323}
11324
11325void game::display_transparency()
11326{
11327 if( use_tiles ) {
11328 display_toggle_overlay( ACTION_DISPLAY_TRANSPARENCY );
11329 }
11330}
11331
11332void game::init_autosave()
11333{
11334 moves_since_last_save = 0;
11335 last_save_timestamp = time( nullptr );
11336}
11337
11338void game::quicksave()
11339{
11340 //Don't autosave if the player hasn't done anything since the last autosave/quicksave,
11341 if( !moves_since_last_save ) {
11342 return;
11343 }
11344 add_msg( m_info, _( "Saving game, this may take a while" ) );
11345
11346 static_popup popup;
11347 popup.message( "%s", _( "Saving game, this may take a while" ) );
11348 ui_manager::redraw();
11349 refresh_display();
11350
11351 time_t now = time( nullptr ); //timestamp for start of saving procedure
11352
11353 //perform save
11354 save();
11355 //Now reset counters for autosaving, so we don't immediately autosave after a quicksave or autosave.
11356 moves_since_last_save = 0;
11357 last_save_timestamp = now;
11358}
11359
11360void game::quickload()
11361{
11362 const WORLDPTR active_world = world_generator->active_world;
11363 if( active_world == nullptr ) {
11364 return;
11365 }
11366
11367 if( active_world->save_exists( save_t::from_player_name( u.name ) ) ) {
11368 if( moves_since_last_save != 0 ) { // See if we need to reload anything
11369 MAPBUFFER.reset();
11370 overmap_buffer.clear();
11371 try {
11372 setup();
11373 } catch( const std::exception &err ) {
11374 debugmsg( "Error: %s", err.what() );
11375 }
11376 load( save_t::from_player_name( u.name ) );
11377 }
11378 } else {
11379 popup_getkey( _( "No saves for %s yet." ), u.name );
11380 }
11381}
11382
11383void game::autosave()
11384{
11385 //Don't autosave if the min-autosave interval has not passed since the last autosave/quicksave.
11386 if( time( nullptr ) < last_save_timestamp + 60 * get_option<int>( "AUTOSAVE_MINUTES" ) ) {
11387 return;
11388 }
11389 quicksave(); //Driving checks are handled by quicksave()
11390}
11391
11392void game::process_artifact( item &it, player &p )
11393{
11394 const bool worn = p.is_worn( it );
11395 const bool wielded = ( &it == &p.weapon );
11396 std::vector<art_effect_passive> effects = it.type->artifact->effects_carried;
11397 if( worn ) {
11398 const std::vector<art_effect_passive> &ew = it.type->artifact->effects_worn;
11399 effects.insert( effects.end(), ew.begin(), ew.end() );
11400 }
11401 if( wielded ) {
11402 const std::vector<art_effect_passive> &ew = it.type->artifact->effects_wielded;
11403 effects.insert( effects.end(), ew.begin(), ew.end() );
11404 }
11405
11406 if( it.is_tool() ) {
11407 // Recharge it if necessary
11408 if( it.ammo_remaining() < it.ammo_capacity() && calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
11409 //Before incrementing charge, check that any extra requirements are met
11410 if( check_art_charge_req( it ) ) {
11411 switch( it.type->artifact->charge_type ) {
11412 case ARTC_NULL:
11413 case NUM_ARTCS:
11414 break; // dummy entries
11415 case ARTC_TIME:
11416 // Once per hour
11417 if( calendar::once_every( 1_hours ) ) {
11418 it.charges++;
11419 }
11420 break;
11421 case ARTC_SOLAR:
11422 if( calendar::once_every( 10_minutes ) &&
11423 is_in_sunlight( p.pos() ) ) {
11424 it.charges++;
11425 }
11426 break;
11427 // Artifacts can inflict pain even on Deadened folks.
11428 // Some weird Lovecraftian thing. ;P
11429 // (So DON'T route them through mod_pain!)
11430 case ARTC_PAIN:
11431 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
11432 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You suddenly feel sharp pain for no reason." ) );
11433 p.mod_pain_noresist( 3 * rng( 1, 3 ) );
11434 it.charges++;
11435 }
11436 break;
11437 case ARTC_HP:
11438 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
11439 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You feel your body decaying." ) );
11440 p.hurtall( 1, nullptr );
11441 it.charges++;
11442 }
11443 break;
11444 case ARTC_FATIGUE:
11445 if( calendar::once_every( 1_minutes ) ) {
11446 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You feel fatigue seeping into your body." ) );
11447 u.mod_fatigue( 3 * rng( 1, 3 ) );
11448 u.mod_stamina( -90 * rng( 1, 3 ) * rng( 1, 3 ) * rng( 2, 3 ) );
11449 it.charges++;
11450 }
11451 break;
11452 // Portals are energetic enough to charge the item.
11453 // Tears in reality are consumed too, but can't charge it.
11454 case ARTC_PORTAL:
11455 for( const tripoint &dest : m.points_in_radius( p.pos(), 1 ) ) {
11456 m.remove_field( dest, fd_fatigue );
11457 if( m.tr_at( dest ).loadid == tr_portal ) {
11458 add_msg( m_good, _( "The portal collapses!" ) );
11459 m.remove_trap( dest );
11460 it.charges++;
11461 break;
11462 }
11463 }
11464 break;
11465 }
11466 }
11467 }
11468 }
11469
11470 for( const art_effect_passive &i : effects ) {
11471 switch( i ) {
11472 case AEP_STR_UP:
11473 p.mod_str_bonus( +4 );
11474 break;
11475 case AEP_DEX_UP:
11476 p.mod_dex_bonus( +4 );
11477 break;
11478 case AEP_PER_UP:
11479 p.mod_per_bonus( +4 );
11480 break;
11481 case AEP_INT_UP:
11482 p.mod_int_bonus( +4 );
11483 break;
11484 case AEP_ALL_UP:
11485 p.mod_str_bonus( +2 );
11486 p.mod_dex_bonus( +2 );
11487 p.mod_per_bonus( +2 );
11488 p.mod_int_bonus( +2 );
11489 break;
11490 case AEP_SPEED_UP:
11491 // Handled in player::current_speed()
11492 break;
11493
11494 case AEP_PBLUE:
11495 if( p.get_rad() > 0 ) {
11496 p.mod_rad( -1 );
11497 }
11498 break;
11499
11500 case AEP_SMOKE:
11501 if( one_in( 10 ) ) {
11502 tripoint pt( p.posx() + rng( -1, 1 ),
11503 p.posy() + rng( -1, 1 ),
11504 p.posz() );
11505 m.add_field( pt, fd_smoke, rng( 1, 3 ) );
11506 }
11507 break;
11508
11509 case AEP_SNAKES:
11510 break; // Handled in player::hit()
11511
11512 case AEP_EXTINGUISH:
11513 for( const tripoint &dest : m.points_in_radius( p.pos(), 1 ) ) {
11514 m.mod_field_age( dest, fd_fire, -1_turns );
11515 }
11516 break;
11517
11518 case AEP_FUN:
11519 //Bonus fluctuates, wavering between 0 and 30-ish - usually around 12
11520 p.add_morale( MORALE_FEELING_GOOD, rng( 1, 2 ) * rng( 2, 3 ), 0, 3_turns, 0_turns, false );
11521 break;
11522
11523 case AEP_HUNGER:
11524 if( one_in( 100 ) ) {
11525 p.mod_stored_kcal( -10 );
11526 }
11527 break;
11528
11529 case AEP_THIRST:
11530 if( one_in( 120 ) ) {
11531 p.mod_thirst( 1 );
11532 }
11533 break;
11534
11535 case AEP_EVIL:
11536 if( one_in( 150 ) ) { // Once every 15 minutes, on average
11537 p.add_effect( effect_evil, 30_minutes );
11538 if( it.is_armor() ) {
11539 if( !worn ) {
11540 add_msg( _( "You have an urge to wear the %s." ),
11541 it.tname() );
11542 }
11543 } else if( !wielded ) {
11544 add_msg( _( "You have an urge to wield the %s." ),
11545 it.tname() );
11546 }
11547 }
11548 break;
11549
11550 case AEP_SCHIZO:
11551 break; // Handled in player::suffer()
11552
11553 case AEP_RADIOACTIVE:
11554 if( one_in( 4 ) ) {
11555 p.irradiate( 1.0f );
11556 }
11557 break;
11558
11559 case AEP_STR_DOWN:
11560 p.mod_str_bonus( -3 );
11561 break;
11562
11563 case AEP_DEX_DOWN:
11564 p.mod_dex_bonus( -3 );
11565 break;
11566
11567 case AEP_PER_DOWN:
11568 p.mod_per_bonus( -3 );
11569 break;
11570
11571 case AEP_INT_DOWN:
11572 p.mod_int_bonus( -3 );
11573 break;
11574
11575 case AEP_ALL_DOWN:
11576 p.mod_str_bonus( -2 );
11577 p.mod_dex_bonus( -2 );
11578 p.mod_per_bonus( -2 );
11579 p.mod_int_bonus( -2 );
11580 break;
11581
11582 case AEP_SPEED_DOWN:
11583 break; // Handled in player::current_speed()
11584
11585 default:
11586 //Suppress warnings
11587 break;
11588 }
11589 }
11590 // Recalculate, as it might have changed (by mod_*_bonus above)
11591 p.str_cur = p.get_str();
11592 p.int_cur = p.get_int();
11593 p.dex_cur = p.get_dex();
11594 p.per_cur = p.get_per();
11595}
11596//Check if an artifact's extra charge requirements are currently met
11597bool check_art_charge_req( item &it )
11598{
11599 player &p = g->u;
11600 bool reqsmet = true;
11601 const bool worn = p.is_worn( it );
11602 const bool wielded = ( &it == &p.weapon );
11603 const bool heldweapon = ( wielded && !it.is_armor() ); //don't charge wielded clothes
11604 map &here = get_map();
11605 switch( it.type->artifact->charge_req ) {
11606 case( ACR_NULL ):
11607 case( NUM_ACRS ):
11608 break;
11609 case( ACR_EQUIP ):
11610 //Generated artifacts won't both be wearable and have charges, but nice for mods
11611 reqsmet = ( worn || heldweapon );
11612 break;
11613 case( ACR_SKIN ):
11614 //As ACR_EQUIP, but also requires nothing worn on bodypart wielding or wearing item
11615 if( !worn && !heldweapon ) {
11616 reqsmet = false;
11617 break;
11618 }
11619 for( const body_part bp : all_body_parts ) {
11620 if( it.covers( bp ) || ( heldweapon && ( bp == bp_hand_r || bp == bp_hand_l ) ) ) {
11621 reqsmet = true;
11622 for( auto &i : p.worn ) {
11623 if( i.covers( bp ) && ( &it != &i ) && i.get_coverage() > 50 ) {
11624 reqsmet = false;
11625 break; //This one's no good, check the next body part
11626 }
11627 }
11628 if( reqsmet ) {
11629 break; //Only need skin contact on one bodypart
11630 }
11631 }
11632 }
11633 break;
11634 case( ACR_SLEEP ):
11635 reqsmet = p.has_effect( effect_sleep );
11636 break;
11637 case( ACR_RAD ):
11638 reqsmet = ( ( here.get_radiation( p.pos() ) > 0 ) || ( p.get_rad() > 0 ) );
11639 break;
11640 case( ACR_WET ):
11641 reqsmet = std::any_of( p.body_wetness.begin(), p.body_wetness.end(),
11642 []( const int w ) {
11643 return w != 0;
11644 } );
11645 if( !reqsmet && sum_conditions( calendar::turn - 1_turns, calendar::turn, p.pos() ).rain_amount > 0
11646 && !( p.in_vehicle && here.veh_at( p.pos() )->is_inside() ) ) {
11647 reqsmet = true;
11648 }
11649 break;
11650 case( ACR_SKY ):
11651 reqsmet = ( p.posz() > 0 );
11652 break;
11653 }
11654 return reqsmet;
11655}
11656
11657void game::start_calendar()
11658{
11659 const bool scen_season = scen->has_flag( "SPR_START" ) || scen->has_flag( "SUM_START" ) ||
11660 scen->has_flag( "AUT_START" ) || scen->has_flag( "WIN_START" ) ||
11661 scen->has_flag( "SUM_ADV_START" );
11662
11663 calendar_config &calendar_config = calendar::config;
11664 if( scen_season ) {
11665 // Configured starting date overridden by scenario, calendar_config.start is left as Spring 1
11666 calendar_config._start_of_cataclysm = calendar::turn_zero + 1_hours *
11667 get_option<int>( "INITIAL_TIME" );
11668 calendar_config._start_of_game = calendar::turn_zero + 1_hours * get_option<int>( "INITIAL_TIME" );
11669 if( scen->has_flag( "SPR_START" ) ) {
11670 calendar_config._initial_season = SPRING;
11671 } else if( scen->has_flag( "SUM_START" ) ) {
11672 calendar_config._initial_season = SUMMER;
11673 calendar_config._start_of_game += calendar_config.season_length();
11674 } else if( scen->has_flag( "AUT_START" ) ) {
11675 calendar_config._initial_season = AUTUMN;
11676 calendar_config._start_of_game += calendar_config.season_length() * 2;
11677 } else if( scen->has_flag( "WIN_START" ) ) {
11678 calendar_config._initial_season = WINTER;
11679 calendar_config._start_of_game += calendar_config.season_length() * 3;
11680 } else if( scen->has_flag( "SUM_ADV_START" ) ) {
11681 calendar_config._initial_season = SUMMER;
11682 calendar_config._start_of_game += calendar_config.season_length() * 5;
11683 } else {
11684 debugmsg( "The Unicorn" );
11685 }
11686 } else {
11687 // No scenario, so use the starting date+time configured in world options
11688 int initial_days = get_option<int>( "INITIAL_DAY" );
11689 if( initial_days == -1 ) {
11690 // 0 - 363 for a 91 day season
11691 initial_days = rng( 0, get_option<int>( "SEASON_LENGTH" ) * 4 - 1 );
11692 }
11693 calendar_config._start_of_cataclysm = calendar::turn_zero + 1_days * initial_days;
11694
11695 // Determine the season based off how long the seasons are set to be
11696 // First take the number of season elapsed up to the starting date, then mod by 4 to get the season of the current year
11697 const int season_number = ( initial_days / get_option<int>( "SEASON_LENGTH" ) ) % 4;
11698 if( season_number == 0 ) {
11699 calendar_config._initial_season = SPRING;
11700 } else if( season_number == 1 ) {
11701 calendar_config._initial_season = SUMMER;
11702 } else if( season_number == 2 ) {
11703 calendar_config._initial_season = AUTUMN;
11704 } else {
11705 calendar_config._initial_season = WINTER;
11706 }
11707
11708 calendar_config._start_of_game = calendar_config._start_of_cataclysm
11709 + 1_hours * get_option<int>( "INITIAL_TIME" )
11710 + 1_days * get_option<int>( "SPAWN_DELAY" );
11711 }
11712
11713 calendar::turn = calendar_config._start_of_game;
11714}
11715
11716void game::add_artifact_messages( const std::vector<art_effect_passive> &effects )
11717{
11718 int net_str = 0;
11719 int net_dex = 0;
11720 int net_per = 0;
11721 int net_int = 0;
11722 int net_speed = 0;
11723
11724 for( auto &i : effects ) {
11725 switch( i ) {
11726 case AEP_STR_UP:
11727 net_str += 4;
11728 break;
11729 case AEP_DEX_UP:
11730 net_dex += 4;
11731 break;
11732 case AEP_PER_UP:
11733 net_per += 4;
11734 break;
11735 case AEP_INT_UP:
11736 net_int += 4;
11737 break;
11738 case AEP_ALL_UP:
11739 net_str += 2;
11740 net_dex += 2;
11741 net_per += 2;
11742 net_int += 2;
11743 break;
11744 case AEP_STR_DOWN:
11745 net_str -= 3;
11746 break;
11747 case AEP_DEX_DOWN:
11748 net_dex -= 3;
11749 break;
11750 case AEP_PER_DOWN:
11751 net_per -= 3;
11752 break;
11753 case AEP_INT_DOWN:
11754 net_int -= 3;
11755 break;
11756 case AEP_ALL_DOWN:
11757 net_str -= 2;
11758 net_dex -= 2;
11759 net_per -= 2;
11760 net_int -= 2;
11761 break;
11762
11763 case AEP_SPEED_UP:
11764 net_speed += 20;
11765 break;
11766 case AEP_SPEED_DOWN:
11767 net_speed -= 20;
11768 break;
11769
11770 case AEP_PBLUE:
11771 break; // No message
11772
11773 case AEP_SNAKES:
11774 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your skin feels slithery." ) );
11775 break;
11776
11777 case AEP_INVISIBLE:
11778 add_msg( m_good, _( "You fade into invisibility!" ) );
11779 break;
11780
11781 case AEP_CLAIRVOYANCE:
11782 case AEP_CLAIRVOYANCE_PLUS:
11783 add_msg( m_good, _( "You can see through walls!" ) );
11784 break;
11785
11786 case AEP_SUPER_CLAIRVOYANCE:
11787 add_msg( m_good, _( "You can see through everything!" ) );
11788 break;
11789
11790 case AEP_STEALTH:
11791 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your steps stop making noise." ) );
11792 break;
11793
11794 case AEP_GLOW:
11795 add_msg( _( "A glow of light forms around you." ) );
11796 break;
11797
11798 case AEP_PSYSHIELD:
11799 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your mental state feels protected." ) );
11800 break;
11801
11802 case AEP_RESIST_ELECTRICITY:
11803 add_msg( m_good, _( "You feel insulated." ) );
11804 break;
11805
11806 case AEP_CARRY_MORE:
11807 add_msg( m_good, _( "Your back feels strengthened." ) );
11808 break;
11809
11810 case AEP_FUN:
11811 add_msg( m_good, _( "You feel a pleasant tingle." ) );
11812 break;
11813
11814 case AEP_HUNGER:
11815 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You feel hungry." ) );
11816 break;
11817
11818 case AEP_THIRST:
11819 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You feel thirsty." ) );
11820 break;
11821
11822 case AEP_EVIL:
11823 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You feel an evil presence" ) );
11824 break;
11825
11826 case AEP_SCHIZO:
11827 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You feel a tickle of insanity." ) );
11828 break;
11829
11830 case AEP_RADIOACTIVE:
11831 add_msg( m_warning, _( "Your skin prickles with radiation." ) );
11832 break;
11833
11834 case AEP_MUTAGENIC:
11835 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You feel your genetic makeup degrading." ) );
11836 break;
11837
11838 case AEP_ATTENTION:
11839 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You feel an otherworldly attention upon you" ) );
11840 break;
11841
11842 case AEP_FORCE_TELEPORT:
11843 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You feel a force pulling you inwards." ) );
11844 break;
11845
11846 case AEP_MOVEMENT_NOISE:
11847 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You hear a rattling noise coming from inside yourself." ) );
11848 break;
11849
11850 case AEP_BAD_WEATHER:
11851 add_msg( m_warning, _( "You feel storms coming." ) );
11852 break;
11853
11854 case AEP_SICK:
11855 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You feel unwell." ) );
11856 break;
11857
11858 case AEP_SMOKE:
11859 add_msg( m_warning, _( "A cloud of smoke appears." ) );
11860 break;
11861 default:
11862 //Suppress warnings
11863 break;
11864 }
11865 }
11866
11867 std::string stat_info;
11868 if( net_str != 0 ) {
11869 stat_info += string_format( _( "Str %s%d! " ),
11870 ( net_str > 0 ? "+" : "" ), net_str );
11871 }
11872 if( net_dex != 0 ) {
11873 stat_info += string_format( _( "Dex %s%d! " ),
11874 ( net_dex > 0 ? "+" : "" ), net_dex );
11875 }
11876 if( net_int != 0 ) {
11877 stat_info += string_format( _( "Int %s%d! " ),
11878 ( net_int > 0 ? "+" : "" ), net_int );
11879 }
11880 if( net_per != 0 ) {
11881 stat_info += string_format( _( "Per %s%d! " ),
11882 ( net_per > 0 ? "+" : "" ), net_per );
11883 }
11884
11885 if( !stat_info.empty() ) {
11886 add_msg( m_neutral, stat_info );
11887 }
11888
11889 if( net_speed != 0 ) {
11890 add_msg( m_info, _( "Speed %s%d!" ), ( net_speed > 0 ? "+" : "" ), net_speed );
11891 }
11892}
11893
11894void game::add_artifact_dreams( )
11895{
11896 //If player is sleeping, get a dream from a carried artifact
11897 //Don't need to check that player is sleeping here, that's done before calling
11898 std::list<item *> art_items = g->u.get_artifact_items();
11899 std::vector<item *> valid_arts;
11900 std::vector<std::vector<std::string>>
11901 valid_dreams; // Tracking separately so we only need to check its req once
11902 //Pull the list of dreams
11903 add_msg( m_debug, "Checking %s carried artifacts", art_items.size() );
11904 for( auto &it : art_items ) {
11905 //Pick only the ones with an applicable dream
11906 const cata::value_ptr<islot_artifact> &art = it->type->artifact;
11907 if( art && art->charge_req != ACR_NULL &&
11908 ( it->ammo_remaining() < it->ammo_capacity() ||
11909 it->ammo_capacity() == 0 ) ) { //or max 0 in case of wacky mod shenanigans
11910 add_msg( m_debug, "Checking artifact %s", it->tname() );
11911 if( check_art_charge_req( *it ) ) {
11912 add_msg( m_debug, " Has freq %s,%s", art->dream_freq_met, art->dream_freq_unmet );
11913 if( art->dream_freq_met > 0 && x_in_y( art->dream_freq_met, 100 ) ) {
11914 add_msg( m_debug, "Adding met dream from %s", it->tname() );
11915 valid_arts.push_back( it );
11916 valid_dreams.push_back( art->dream_msg_met );
11917 }
11918 } else {
11919 add_msg( m_debug, " Has freq %s,%s", art->dream_freq_met, art->dream_freq_unmet );
11920 if( art->dream_freq_unmet > 0 && x_in_y( art->dream_freq_unmet, 100 ) ) {
11921 add_msg( m_debug, "Adding unmet dream from %s", it->tname() );
11922 valid_arts.push_back( it );
11923 valid_dreams.push_back( art->dream_msg_unmet );
11924 }
11925 }
11926 }
11927 }
11928 if( !valid_dreams.empty() ) {
11929 add_msg( m_debug, "Found %s valid artifact dreams", valid_dreams.size() );
11930 const int selected = rng( 0, valid_arts.size() - 1 );
11931 auto it = valid_arts[selected];
11932 auto msg = random_entry( valid_dreams[selected] );
11933 const std::string &dream = string_format( _( msg ), it->tname() );
11934 add_msg( dream );
11935 } else {
11936 add_msg( m_debug, "Didn't have any dreams, sorry" );
11937 }
11938}
11939
11940int game::get_levx() const
11941{
11942 return m.get_abs_sub().x;
11943}
11944
11945int game::get_levy() const
11946{
11947 return m.get_abs_sub().y;
11948}
11949
11950int game::get_levz() const
11951{
11952 return m.get_abs_sub().z;
11953}
11954
11955overmap &game::get_cur_om() const
11956{
11957 // The player is located in the middle submap of the map.
11958 const tripoint sm = m.get_abs_sub() + tripoint( HALF_MAPSIZE, HALF_MAPSIZE, 0 );
11959 const tripoint pos_om = sm_to_om_copy( sm );
11960 // TODO: fix point types
11961 return overmap_buffer.get( point_abs_om( pos_om.xy() ) );
11962}
11963
11964std::vector<npc *> game::allies()
11965{
11966 return get_npcs_if( [&]( const npc & guy ) {
11967 if( !guy.is_hallucination() ) {
11968 return guy.is_ally( g->u );
11969 } else {
11970 return false;
11971 }
11972 } );
11973}
11974
11975std::vector<Creature *> game::get_creatures_if( const std::function<bool( const Creature & )>
11976 &pred )
11977{
11978 std::vector<Creature *> result;
11979 for( Creature &critter : all_creatures() ) {
11980 if( pred( critter ) ) {
11981 result.push_back( &critter );
11982 }
11983 }
11984 return result;
11985}
11986
11987std::vector<npc *> game::get_npcs_if( const std::function<bool( const npc & )> &pred )
11988{
11989 std::vector<npc *> result;
11990 for( npc &guy : all_npcs() ) {
11991 if( pred( guy ) ) {
11992 result.push_back( &guy );
11993 }
11994 }
11995 return result;
11996}
11997
11998template<>
11999bool game::non_dead_range<monster>::iterator::valid()
12000{
12001 current = iter->lock();
12002 return current && !current->is_dead();
12003}
12004
12005template<>
12006bool game::non_dead_range<npc>::iterator::valid()
12007{
12008 current = iter->lock();
12009 return current && !current->is_dead();
12010}
12011
12012template<>
12013bool game::non_dead_range<Creature>::iterator::valid()
12014{
12015 current = iter->lock();
12016 // There is no Creature::is_dead function, so we can't write
12017 // return current && !current->is_dead();
12018 if( !current ) {
12019 return false;
12020 }
12021 const Creature *const critter = current.get();
12022 if( critter->is_monster() ) {
12023 return !static_cast<const monster *>( critter )->is_dead();
12024 }
12025 if( critter->is_npc() ) {
12026 return !static_cast<const npc *>( critter )->is_dead();
12027 }
12028 return true; // must be g->u
12029}
12030
12031game::monster_range::monster_range( game &game_ref )
12032{
12033 const auto &monsters = game_ref.critter_tracker->get_monsters_list();
12034 items.insert( items.end(), monsters.begin(), monsters.end() );
12035}
12036
12037game::Creature_range::Creature_range( game &game_ref ) : u( &game_ref.u, []( player * ) { } )
12038{
12039 const auto &monsters = game_ref.critter_tracker->get_monsters_list();
12040 items.insert( items.end(), monsters.begin(), monsters.end() );
12041 items.insert( items.end(), game_ref.active_npc.begin(), game_ref.active_npc.end() );
12042 items.push_back( u );
12043}
12044
12045game::npc_range::npc_range( game &game_ref )
12046{
12047 items.insert( items.end(), game_ref.active_npc.begin(), game_ref.active_npc.end() );
12048}
12049
12050game::Creature_range game::all_creatures()
12051{
12052 return Creature_range( *this );
12053}
12054
12055game::monster_range game::all_monsters()
12056{
12057 return monster_range( *this );
12058}
12059
12060game::npc_range game::all_npcs()
12061{
12062 return npc_range( *this );
12063}
12064
12065Creature *game::get_creature_if( const std::function<bool( const Creature & )> &pred )
12066{
12067 for( Creature &critter : all_creatures() ) {
12068 if( pred( critter ) ) {
12069 return &critter;
12070 }
12071 }
12072 return nullptr;
12073}
12074
12075std::string game::get_player_base_save_path() const
12076{
12077 return get_world_base_save_path() + "/" + base64_encode( u.name );
12078}
12079
12080std::string game::get_world_base_save_path() const
12081{
12082 if( world_generator->active_world == nullptr ) {
12083 return PATH_INFO::savedir();
12084 }
12085 return world_generator->active_world->folder_path();
12086}
12087
12088void game::shift_destination_preview( const point &delta )
12089{
12090 for( tripoint &p : destination_preview ) {
12091 p += delta;
12092 }
12093}
12094
12095bool game::slip_down()
12096{
12097 ///\EFFECT_DEX decreases chances of slipping while climbing
12098 int climb = u.dex_cur;
12099 if( u.has_trait( trait_BADKNEES ) ) {
12100 climb = climb / 2;
12101 }
12102 if( one_in( climb ) ) {
12103 add_msg( m_bad, _( "You slip while climbing and fall down again." ) );
12104 if( climb <= 1 ) {
12105 add_msg( m_bad, _( "Climbing is impossible in your current state." ) );
12106 }
12107 return true;
12108 }
12109 return false;
12110}
12111
12112namespace cata_event_dispatch
12113{
12114void avatar_moves( const avatar &u, const map &m, const tripoint &p )
12115{
12116 mtype_id mount_type;
12117 if( u.is_mounted() ) {
12118 mount_type = u.mounted_creature->type->id;
12119 }
12120 g->events().send<event_type::avatar_moves>( mount_type, m.ter( p ).id(),
12121 u.get_movement_mode(), u.is_underwater(), p.z );
12122}
12123} // namespace cata_event_dispatch
12124
12125event_bus &get_event_bus()
12126{
12127 return g->events();
12128}
12129
12130distribution_grid_tracker &get_distribution_grid_tracker()
12131{
12132 return *g->grid_tracker_ptr;
12133}
